5dplasmodium.name: 5D Plasmodium
5dplasmodium.flavor: A swiftly-proliferating magi-crafted blood parasite lets its host translate between locations through higher dimensions.

properties.name: Blood-fuelled
properties.description: Each higher dimensional step costs 1 life.

properties.name: Chills
properties.description: The user shivers terribly and suffers [-] in cold weather. Such as when translating through a higher dimension.

acceleratedflail.name: Accelerated Flail
acceleratedflail.flavor: A spiked head of spaceship metals encasing a dynamo-kinetic daemon accelerator attached by a chain to a long thrumming handle. What could go wrong?

properties.name: Clumsy
properties.description: [-] to attack rolls.

properties.name: Guidance
properties.description: Wielder can spend 1 action and 1 life to commune with the daemon accelerator. The accelerated flail then gains [+] to strike one target.

accountantmonkrobes.name: Accountant Monk Robes
accountantmonkrobes.flavor: Flowing accoutrements of the Cogflower Inquisition. Very little metaphysical nonsense can pass these mathemagical threads.

properties.name: Ascetic
properties.description: Resistant to ba damage.

properties.name: Lo-kinetic
properties.description: Damper field grants resistance against melee and area attack damage.

acidmushrooms.name: Acid Mushrooms
acidmushrooms.flavor: Iridescent blue-yellow mushroom caps, fermented and dried, tasting of sunshine.

properties.name: Debilitating
properties.description: [-][-] to all physical tests, [-] to all mental tests.

properties.name: Hallucinogen
properties.description: Powerful hallucinations and visions.

properties.name: Revelation
properties.description: Extreme aura test. Success: user touches the source code of the universe and permanently gains 1 aura.

properties.name: Sour
properties.description: Best taken with sugar.

adamantjewelry.name: Adamant Jewelry
adamantjewelry.flavor: It is sharp and unbreakable. So how did they craft it into those weird shapes?

properties.name: Burglerous
properties.description: [+] to breaking in through windows and picking locks. Treat as burglary gear.

properties.name: Unbreakable
properties.description: Literally.

administrationhomunculus.name: Administration Homunculus
administrationhomunculus.flavor: Simulated legally-representative copy of a person. Time-strapped high net worth individuals use AH units to represent them in administrative, legal, and even at the office; freeing up time for vital socializing and networking.

properties.name: Divergence danger
properties.description: If an AH is not regularly synchronized with its owner, it may develop an independent personality. Most jurisdictions treat this as terminal owner negligence.

properties.name: Second me
properties.description: A second they.

properties.name: Status symbol
properties.description: +3 ba.

airbear.name: Air Bear
airbear.flavor: This designer anemone attaches to a creature’s face and its metabolism synthesizes enough air for a pig-sized creature.

properties.name: Short-lifer
properties.description: The air bear melts away six hours after unwrapping.

properties.name: Smelly
properties.description: Air bear decay produces hydrogen sulfide.

airbell.name: Airbell
airbell.flavor: Lab-grown synthetic plant-fungus machine to deploy a breathable one person atmosphere bubble.

properties.name: Air supply
properties.description: Enough for one pig-sized animal for one day.

properties.name: Edible
properties.description: In need, the airbell serves as 1 sk of supplies. Tastes like sunchoke. Produces gas.

properties.name: Photosynthesizer
properties.description: Fertilized and watered, the airbell recharges its air galls in a week.

archmage’shidesuit.name: Archmage’s Hide Suit
archmage’shidesuit.flavor: An inhuman archmage’s hide, preserved and cured into a vestment. It positively crackles with eldritch wrath.

properties.name: Horrifying
properties.description: [+] to frighten.

properties.name: Wrathful
properties.description: [+] to ka damage.

amberancestorcuirass.name: Amber Ancestor Cuirass
amberancestorcuirass.flavor: Strands of ancestral memories trapped in amber, fashioned into a cuirass of arcane glory.

properties.name: Memories
properties.description: Grants 1 thought.

amberwandgun.name: Amber Wandgun
amberwandgun.flavor: A genteel wand that discharges an arcing bolt of pain and fire.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Technospiritual prayer wheel batteries.

properties.name: Ranged
properties.description: [-] vs far away targets.

amphibisuit“eogyrine”.name: Amphibisuit “Eogyrine”
amphibisuit“eogyrine”.flavor: Large synthetic basal amphibian diving symbiote. It envelops the wearer and breathes through its 167 skin. The powerful 2 metre tail provides ample swimming speed.

properties.name: Feeding
properties.description: Drains 1 life per day from its wearer.

properties.name: Storage
properties.description: Packs away in a membranous egg sack for transport.

properties.name: Swimming
properties.description: Fast in water.

properties.name: Water-breathing
properties.description: What it says.

ancestorperfume.name: Ancestor Perfume
ancestorperfume.flavor: Essence makes a living person smell like one of the dead. Heavy notes of spice and leather.

properties.name: Passing
properties.description: [+] to looking dead.

astralammo.name: Astral Ammo
astralammo.flavor: Platonic ammunition that tears apart metaphysical conceits.

properties.name: Anti-ghost
properties.description: Double damage vs. ghosts and phantasms.

properties.name: Ka-version
properties.description: Deals ka damage.

autodoctor“markbasket”.name: Autodoctor “Mark Basket”
autodoctor“markbasket”.flavor: Resembling a cross between an anemone and five crabs in a hat, the autodoctor is a standard issue humanoid repair system. Old units are often village treasures in this afterglow of creation.

properties.name: Assistant
properties.description: Used as an assistant, it grants [+] to medical tests.

properties.name: Expert system
properties.description: Performs as a skilled, if joyless, expert medicus. It tests with a +9 modifier.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Accepts all standard omni-batteries and life transfers.

properties.name: Reassembler
properties.description: Given a day, it stitches together a serviceable body for a personality transfer. Parts not included.

automaticprayerwheel.name: Automatic Prayer Wheel
automaticprayerwheel.flavor: As mediated by the Ill-Nano (updated K. Scion v.), a holy text from the creation is encoded in a hexadecimal musical code on a blessed data cylinder. As it spins, it blares out the heavenly message as 4,096 bpm extratonal electronic music.

properties.name: Anti-ancestral
properties.description: [+] damage to the undead and their similars.

properties.name: Anti-daimonic
properties.description: [+] damage to daimons and spirits.

properties.name: Hand crank
properties.description: If powered by hand, requires an action to charge before every attack.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Uses a golem battery.

autopoet“inspirogolem”.name: Autopoet “Inspirogolem”
autopoet“inspirogolem”.flavor: A synthetic poet that sings inspiring songs to encourage its owner to great deeds.

properties.name: Charged
properties.description: An omni-battery or 10 life to gain 7 charges.

properties.name: Heroism
properties.description: In a blast of directed metaphysical encouragement, it grants a hero die (1 charge).

properties.name: Inspiration
properties.description: [+] to nearby allied tests for the round (1 charge).

properties.name: Poet
properties.description: Location appro-priate background drone or chant.

properties.name: Semisentient
properties.description: Comes with three pre-designed friend personalities.

backhandedcompliment.name: Backhanded Compliment
backhandedcompliment.flavor: It looked like they were friends.

properties.name: Poisonous challenge
properties.description: Target can gain [+] to their next test at the cost of suffering damage again.

properties.name: Limited replay
properties.description: Not reusable with the same audience. Functions like ammo.

beliefstructuresymbol.name: Belief Structure Symbol
beliefstructuresymbol.flavor: An official, registered, trademarked, patented, and fully approved holy symbol of the legal monopoly belief system.

properties.name: Defensive
properties.description: +1 ka & ba defence.

properties.name: Pass
properties.description: Access to economy-plus citizen-tier religious complexes.

properties.name: Better
properties.description: Increases weapon damage one step.

biggamegun.name: Big Game Gun
biggamegun.flavor: An infantry-portable heavy orichalcum projector traditionally used by Neoprimitive Human liberation fighters against the Farpower voyan war golems. Their manufacture has since passed into the gunsmithing lore of many cultural survivals from the misty aeons.

properties.name: Ammo
properties.description: Large calibre shells.

properties.name: Armour Penetrating
properties.description: Deals additional ha damage equal to a target's ha defence.

properties.name: Long Range
properties.description: Attacks nearby and far away targets normally. [-] vs adjacent targets.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: If it fires more than once per round, the projector begins to overheat, increasing the chance of a critical failure by 1 each time it is fired. The projector cools down after a quarter of an hour or so.

blacklightlotus.name: Black Light Lotus
blacklightlotus.flavor: Facemakers process the rare black light lotus, poisonous in its natural state, by the light of their ultramarine sun to produce the glowing powder beloved of the rich and beautiful.

properties.name: Cat-loved
properties.description: Cats using black light lotus feel more confident and gain a level for a few hours.

properties.name: Cosmetic
properties.description: Smeared on the skin, it exudes mind-altering pheromones for a day. +1 charisma per dose.

properties.name: Edible
properties.description: Lets the user ignore a mental burden for one week. Eaten in a pastry or sweetmeat.

properties.name: Inhaled
properties.description: It brings deep sleep (a night) and restores 1d6 life. Usually smoked mixed with honey and vim spices.

bluelotusroot.name: Blue Lotus Root
bluelotusroot.flavor: Shockingly blue and the size of a sweet potato. Pickled in gods-blood for best effect.

properties.name: Lotus lobe
properties.description: User accesses an extra-temporal mental space where they can store one extra spell. Or dispose of an unwanted memory.

properties.name: Not-all-here
properties.description: [-] to perception tests due to mild hallucinations.

blessedcap.name: Blessed Cap
blessedcap.flavor: A cap in the style of a local sportsball military display unit, blessed by a technopriest.

properties.name: Team colours
properties.description: [+] to social tests with friends, [-] with unfriendlies.

bourgeoisblade.name: Bourgeois Blade
bourgeoisblade.flavor: A posh sword, more status symbol than weapon.

properties.name: Decorated
properties.description: +2 ba defence.

boxeddeity.name: Boxed Deity
boxeddeity.flavor: A spark of the demiurge recreated within a matrix of titanium glass and gleaming chrome.

properties.name: Connect
properties.description: Hard charisma test: The spark connects to a machine or golem, opening comms.

properties.name: Intelligence
properties.description: Mind inside.

properties.name: Memory
properties.description: Easy charisma test: The spark reveals a private moment from a higher era.

properties.name: Truth
properties.description: Moderate charisma test: The spark gives a true answer, though it might be an era or two out of date.

properties.name: Wow
properties.description: The spark puts on a hologram show that impressive the lesser people of fallen eras and grants [+] to the bearer’s ba tests.

bonerankleather greatcoat.name: Bone Rank Leather Greatcoat
bonerankleather greatcoat.flavor: An ash-white greatcoat of supple texture and terrifyingly austere cut. Has special pockets for sacred books and pens.

properties.name: Dead-warded
properties.description: Undead are repulsed by the Iksan rationalist runes woven into the lining of the greatcoat. All undead attacks against the wearer suffer [-].

properties.name: Ghostbone
properties.description: Incoming ka damage is reduced [-].

properties.name: Spirit-boost
properties.description: Increases wearer’s aura and charisma by 1 each.

bountycorporae.name: Bounty Corporae
bountycorporae.flavor: A bounty is placed on the ha, the body, of the target. Whether it is delivered living or dead, the local juridic automaton will pay out a thousand labour-days (i.e. €1k) in reward.

properties.name: Infamous
properties.description: The target suffers [-] to social tests in the locality.

properties.name: Coin-marked
properties.description: Surprise attacks against the target gain [+].

properties.name: Single-use
properties.description: Can’t be used twice.

califragilistic.name: Cali Fragilistic
califragilistic.flavor: There are flowers in the garden of delights whose vapours make users alluring … but fragile.

properties.name: Charismatic
properties.description: +1 charisma.

properties.name: Fragile
properties.description: Target is vulnerable [-] to all damage.

cancescepter.name: Cancescepter
cancescepter.flavor: The cancer scepter is a real can of worms.

properties.name: Mutagenesis
properties.description: On a natural roll of 13, the target loses an action and gains a random mutation.

properties.name: Tentacles
properties.description: On a natural roll of 7, the target suffers double damage as seven tentacles erupt from its flesh to deal 1d10 ha damage to seven adjacent targets.

cartelhandshake.name: Cartel Handshake
cartelhandshake.flavor: The mark of the authority is upon the wielder of the handshake.

properties.name: Marked
properties.description: Their allegiance cannot be concealed when the rhetoric is revealed.

properties.name: Gold-armoured
properties.description: The wielder gains +1 ha, ka, and ba defence from every €250 carried.

centuriongoldsuit.name: Centurion Gold Suit
centuriongoldsuit.flavor: A gilded golem suit with actual ornate winglets to make the wearer more obvious on the battlefield—and to send and receive semaphore commands.

properties.name: Blatant
properties.description: [-] to stealth.

properties.name: Daimonized
properties.description: Grants 3 charisma.

properties.name: Ornate
properties.description: Ba damage resistance [-].

properties.name: Reasonably inspiring
properties.description: Each turn one ally gains 1d6 to a roll.

chainsword.name: Chainsword
chainsword.flavor: A ripping chain of shark-like metal teeth powered by a roaring golem hilt-and-gauntlet combination. An elegant weapon of the second zombie apocalypse renaissance.

properties.name: Versatile
properties.description: 2d8 damage two-handed.

properties.name: Vorpal
properties.description: Severs an extremity on a critical hit. Decapitates corporeal undead targets.

properties.name: Zombie ripper
properties.description: Deals double damage to corporeal undead.

golemdriverleather jacket.name: Golem Driver Leather Jacket
golemdriverleather jacket.flavor: One sleeve tastefully ripped for that daring wastelander look.

properties.name: Cool-looking
properties.description: Resistance to ba damage [-] in the wastelands.

chainsickle.name: Chain Sickle
chainsickle.flavor: A weapon developed independently several times during the great servile rebellion time split, it has since become a symbol of the Agricolyte Peasant Republics.

properties.name: Disarming
properties.description: [+] to ripping weapons out of hands.

properties.name: Hindering
properties.description: [+] to tests to slow, trip, or otherwise hinder.

properties.name: Parrying
properties.description: Grants 3 ha defence.

properties.name: Two hands
properties.description: Quite.

childwater“eaud’enfant”.name: Childwater “Eau d’Enfant”
childwater“eaud’enfant”.flavor: Makes the dead smell like the living. Flowery, citrusy notes mixed with a hint of milk.

properties.name: Jolly
properties.description: [+] to looking alive.

classring.name: Class Ring
classring.flavor: A heavy ring of several metals woven together to symbolize the mastery of techné and arché. The ring is laced with oldtech that increases its kinetic energy.

properties.name: Unarmed
properties.description: Counts as an unarmed attack in physical conflicts. If the wielder’s unarmed damage is equal or greater, it instead increases damage dice one step.

properties.name: Universal authority
properties.description: [+] to credentials with educated humans.

commandingbadge.name: Commanding Badge
commandingbadge.flavor: Proving membership in an authority organization.

properties.name: Pass
properties.description: Opens doors, allows access to organization facilities.

properties.name: Restricted
properties.description: The authority deals [+] ba damage against characters falsely claiming membership.

condenseddrama.name: Condensed Drama
condenseddrama.flavor: Strife and broken dreams condensed into a bitter nectar.

properties.name: Fighting fuel
properties.description: User gains [+] to tests to escalate conflicts.

properties.name: Soul food
properties.description: Vitalizes restless spirits, energy vampires, ghouls.

crucifixbow.name: Crucifix Bow
crucifixbow.flavor: A silent war crossbow used by the cloud empire survivals.

properties.name: Arrows
properties.description: Bolts as ammunition.

properties.name: Ranged
properties.description: [-] vs away targets.

properties.name: Two-handed
properties.description: Crank it.

crystalsiegerod.name: Crystal Siege Rod
crystalsiegerod.flavor: A quartz disintegration ray amplifier housed in a heavily-glyphed brass and brazilwood casing.

properties.name: Clumsy
properties.description: [-] to attack rolls.

properties.name: Degrading
properties.description: Each die that deals maximum damage reduces an enemy's defences by 1 each.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Requires a crystal battery to function (5 charges).

properties.name: Siege
properties.description: Deals double damage to structures and heavily armoured vehicles or very large monsters.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: Only fires once per round because of rod charging times.

properties.name: Very big
properties.description: 3 stones & 2 hands.

dancingshoes.name: Dancing Shoes
dancingshoes.flavor: Slick. Like they were made for moon-walking.

properties.name: Dance dance dance
properties.description: [+] to dancing, evasion, jumping.

properties.name: Lunar shoemaker
properties.description: [-] to all damage in moonlight.

degreepostgraduate.name: Degree, Postgraduate
degreepostgraduate.flavor: Awarded with distinction by the OBELISK University subconscious graduate program.
degreepostgraduate.description: When a hero receives the degree, they choose a skill they are trained in.

properties.name: Expertise
properties.description: Hero can gain [+] to a test involving the skill, but if they fail, they take 1d6 humiliation damage.

delusorycrystal.name: Delusory Crystal
delusorycrystal.flavor: A prism spinning in a gyroscope bends perceptions to better days.

properties.name: Detachment
properties.description: Costs 3 charges. Struck target takes no damage and disappears into a delusory dimension for 3 rounds.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: 3 charges. Gains 1 charge per action spent cranking.

properties.name: Reverie
properties.description: Target may choose to lose 2 actions and gain 1d6 life instead of taking damage.

dopplerpod.name: Doppler Pod
dopplerpod.flavor: Designed to duplicate a single pig-sized animal. The doppler pod’s tendrils cradle an animal, lulling it to sweet sleep, and overnight create a near-perfect clone.

properties.name: Healthy
properties.description: The clone is uninjured and free of most diseases.

properties.name: Organ farm
properties.description: Memories are not transferred, and the clone can be used to rebuild an injured master.

dragon'smenace.name: Dragon's Menace
dragon'smenace.flavor: A curse inscribed upon the scale of a palace dragon from the Long Ago carries the weight and manipulation of a fossilized time.

properties.name: Disorienting
properties.description: Target suffers [-] to tests that require concentration for the rest of the round.

properties.name: Fearsome
properties.description: Target suffers [-] to morale, sanity, and fear tests for the rest of the round.

duesofsacrifice.name: Dues of Sacrifice
duesofsacrifice.flavor: Some believe that the arc of history is on the side of the Members. Some believe this arc may also bend bullets. A lining of tracts may certainly stop some.

properties.name: Prophecy's armour
properties.description: +2 ha defence.

ebéteenopium.name: Ebéteen Opium
ebéteenopium.flavor: Reddish tarry balls rendered from the sweat of the Fleshgod.

properties.name: Addictive
properties.description: Easy test. A worshipper without their god’s own medicine experiences withdrawal. For weeks, they suffer [-] to all tests and lose 2 life per sunrise.

properties.name: Constipation
properties.description: What it says.

properties.name: Cura
properties.description: Restores 1d4+1 health and removes a burden of fear or sorrow.

properties.name: Lassitude
properties.description: [-] to tests for hours.

properties.name: Painless
properties.description: Character can ignore a burden of pain for a day.

eisendoppelgänger.name: Eisen Doppelgänger
eisendoppelgänger.flavor: A micro-golem skin of iron ants and cosmic fish. It delivers crackling arcs of disruption.

properties.name: Augmenting
properties.description: Increases ha damage dice one step while worn.

properties.name: Autonomous
properties.description: The skin can detach and shadow the wielder. Once per round, it makes a free attack against the first target attacked by the wielder that round. Its defences are double the wielder’s (or 19); it shares its life pool and attack modifiers with the wielder.

properties.name: Defensive
properties.description: +2 ha defence while worn.

properties.name: Electromagnificent
properties.description: Deals double damage to electrics, synthetics, and golems.

electricicon.name: Electric Icon
electricicon.flavor: An electromagnificent painting of the Mother Electric projected from a three-point frame.

properties.name: Defensive
properties.description: +1 ka & ba defence.

properties.name: Mother’s embrace
properties.description: EM discharge targets all adjacent for 2d6 ka and 2d6 ha damage. Burns 1 charge.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: 3 charges. Gains one charge per hour in the sun. Can also spend an action and 1d6 life to restore a charge.

electromagicalimplant.name: Electromagical Implant
electromagicalimplant.flavor: A series of dermal implants that can record and display information. The wiring also helps to disperse metaphysical attacks.

properties.name: Electric friends
properties.description: [+] to social tests with golems and synths.

properties.name: Wireless
properties.description: Communicates with the noösphere. Allows p2p chat with other noösphere users.

electromagnificentflare.name: Electromagnificent Flare
electromagnificentflare.flavor: The flare releases a tightly-coiled higher-dimensional shortforce net. As the forcefield net decays in the simpler mundane world, it recharges electro-magical batteries with astonishing speed.

properties.name: Disruptive
properties.description: [-] to EM comms and circuits due to interference.

properties.name: Sustenance
properties.description: Feeds a synthetic, golem or cryptohuman for a day.

emperor’snewclothes.name: Emperor’s New Clothes
emperor’snewclothes.flavor: So wonderful that only good people of taste, breeding, and distinction can even see them.

properties.name: Chilly
properties.description: [-] vs cold.

properties.name: Diaphanous
properties.description: [+] damage from critical hits.

properties.name: Fragile
properties.description: Destroyed by critical hit from a skeptical ba attack.

emperor’sskullflask.name: Emperor’s Skull Flask
emperor’sskullflask.flavor: The skull of an emperor fashioned into a gilded, jewel-encrusted flask. Can be worn as a classy barbarian belt ornament.

properties.name: Flask
properties.description: Can carry potions.

properties.name: Imperial immunity
properties.description: Take no ba or ka damage from imperials. [-] ka and ba damage from all lower status attackers.

properties.name: Terrifying
properties.description: [+] to intimidation.

energyfunnelcapote.name: Energy Funnel Capote
energyfunnelcapote.flavor: A sheet of force-fabric entangled with an emitter orb through a worm-hole funnel. Traditionally used by plasma fighters to channel energies away from their bodies. All absorbed energy is instantly emitted through the orb. Works to a range of a few hundred metres.

properties.name: Delicate
properties.description: Vulnerable to physical damage, wear and tear.

properties.name: Funnel
properties.description: Translates up to 100 points of damage.

properties.name: Iridescent
properties.description: Looks very pretty. Worn as a cloak, grants +2 ba.

properties.name: Setting
properties.description: User manipulates a seven-thread matrix to set the type of energy absorbed.

excellentjoke.name: Excellent Joke
excellentjoke.flavor: Razor-sharp humour written by a very rare algorithm engine from the Old Days.

properties.name: Limited liability
properties.description: Enemies struck by the joke suffer [-] to counterattacks that round.

properties.name: Limited replay
properties.description: Not reusable with the same audience. Works like ammo.

properties.name: Exploding
properties.description: All damage dice become exploding.

properties.name: Explosive
properties.description: Also damages objects adjacent to the target.

exquisiteface.name: Exquisite Face
exquisiteface.flavor: The time and money it takes to paint a commanding face are not something any fool could afford. The cosmetics alone require a small army of itinerant labourers to go hungry in the scented forests of Urborja.

properties.name: Flattering
properties.description: Grants [+] to seduction and temptation tests.

properties.name: Delicate
properties.description: Damage dice decrease if exposed to water, high temperature, severe exertion, or other discomforts.

exsecrarium.name: Exsecrarium
exsecrarium.flavor: A censer of censure. The gentle mist and the aromatic herbs wafting from the alabaster and gold orb direct hate and curses against the victim of the wielder’s imprecations and gestures.

properties.name: Ammo
properties.description: Pure mountain water.

properties.name: Curse-loved
properties.description: Target suffers [-] to all tests against curses.

properties.name: Excommunicado
properties.description: Target suffers [-] to all ba and ka attacks against community members.

properties.name: Ranged
properties.description: [-] vs far away targets.

properties.name: Two-handed
properties.description: Waving and gestures weave the binding.

extra-dimensionalpurse.name: Extra-Dimensional Purse
extra-dimensionalpurse.flavor: Since the personal portals first appeared, they have become a standby of the professional classes who must carry their work kit while maintaining an elegant silhouette. Popular styles include bowling bags, clutches, minaudières, muffs, and reticules.

properties.name: Sorting challenge
properties.description: Taking out the top item is free. Finding things deeper within: charisma test, or a random item is retrieved. Find specific item: one action.

properties.name: Space
properties.description: The purse holds 1 sack’s worth of inventory. It still has to fit through the opening.

eyeofthe metagorgon.name: Eye of the Metagorgon
eyeofthe metagorgon.flavor: The orb was originally a reality debugging tool. Now it floats in a blinded nutrĳug.

properties.name: Hungry
properties.description: Requires a fistful of nutritious organics per day.

properties.name: Imbue
properties.description: Wielder can spend 1 life and 1 action to extend the stasifactor effect for another round.

properties.name: Stasifactor
properties.description: Target is petrified slightly outside normal spacetime for the rest of the round. [+] to attacks v. target, [-] to damage.

fastcolour.name: Fast Colour
fastcolour.flavor: Liquid essence of velocity mixed with paint. The iridescent hues scream for speed. And deliver. A dose is enough to paint 2m², or one baseline human.

properties.name: Faster
properties.description: A creature or vehicle painted with the fast colour gains [+] to all speed and racing tests.

properties.name: Washes off
properties.description: After a few weeks.

fiat.name: Fiat
fiat.flavor: The thought-adjustable self-replicating crystal transforms an orthotope of reality with sides measuring 0.1, 0.4, and 0.9 standard units into any substance the user is intimately familiar with.

properties.name: Standard units
properties.description: A metre in some places, a meter in others. A yard in third places.

properties.name: Incendiary
properties.description: Target catches fire. Suffers 1d6 damage per round. Agility test to douse.

flamesprayer.name: Flamesprayer
flamesprayer.flavor: A makeshift contraption that spews forth flammable liquids.

properties.name: Indiscriminate
properties.description: Attacks target all creatures in the vicinity, including allies.

properties.name: Inflammatory
properties.description: Inflammatory - On hit: flammable targets are set alight (1d6 damage per round).

properties.name: Strange ammo
properties.description: Strange ammo - costs 1 Supply to refill tank after each combat.

flycactusbiscuit.name: Fly Cactus Biscuit
flycactusbiscuit.flavor: Hard wastelander biscuits from a rare silky cactus. Tastes like ham.

properties.name: Elevating
properties.description: Reduces user’s weight by half until digested.

properties.name: Enduring
properties.description: Does not go bad.

properties.name: Hepatic dysfunction
properties.description: Overindulging in fly cactus destroys the liver. This is deadly.

forgedevidence.name: Forged Evidence
forgedevidence.flavor: If a thief hangs in the forest and nobody sees them, does a thief even hang?

properties.name: Trouble's company
properties.description: target suffers [+] ba damage for the rest of the round.

properties.name: Limited
properties.description: Functions like ammo.

fulltechnicolorspectrum suit.name: Full Technicolor Spectrum Suit
fulltechnicolorspectrum suit.flavor: The finest robe of many colours.

properties.name: Fragile
properties.description: Loses 1 ka per ha attack. Fully repairs itself in a week.

properties.name: High definition
properties.description: Very lifelike and bright display.

properties.name: Many colours
properties.description: Counts as any colour for effects and modifiers.

properties.name: Very obvious
properties.description: [-] to stealth.

generativeaxis.name: Generative Axis
generativeaxis.flavor: The devourer liked to hear it was a good cannon. That it was doing a good job. 144 A delicate strange-matter rod rotating within a steel-glass shaft. The crystal spheres at either end spark with numinous essence.

properties.name: Clumsy
properties.description: [-] to melee attacks.

properties.name: Mass ejection
properties.description: With a flick, the wielder can launch the nimbus at a nearby or far away [-] target.

properties.name: Nimbus
properties.description: Wielder can spend 1 life to create a healing nimbus about 4 metres across. Every creature within the nimbus gains 1 life. The glowing effect lasts one round.

properties.name: Two-handed
properties.description: It’s axle-sized.

ghoulgarland.name: Ghoul Garland
ghoulgarland.flavor: Rat skulls, garlic bulbs, sunflower seeds, a cogflower carved in ebony, seven nails, and a vial of holy spring water.

properties.name: Anti-ghoul
properties.description: [+] to tests against undead paralytic effects.

properties.name: Anti-vampiric
properties.description: Vampires suffer [-] when attacking the wearer.

properties.name: Displeasing
properties.description: Undead prefer other adjacent targets if available.

ghostboneaxe.name: Ghostbone Axe
ghostboneaxe.flavor: An axe made from the bones of the Early World's shimmering titans. The energies still bound within these gifts of creation devastate abominations against the circle of life.

properties.name: Balancer
properties.description: Ignores all undead immunities and resistances.

properties.name: Ghostbreaker
properties.description: Deals increased damage [+] to incorporeal targets.

properties.name: Two hands
properties.description: It’s that big.

ghostworldkey.name: Ghostworld Key
ghostworldkey.flavor: An implant or symbiote for easy access to the pre-historic daemon worlds that wreathe the planet like gossamer webs of thought and dreams. Most keys access the less decayed daemon worlds, like the noösphere or the metaverse. Keys for older or more restricted worlds like skynet or terragenesis-creation-overlay are harder to come by.

properties.name: Easy access
properties.description: User can project their spirit-self into the ka world as a free action.

properties.name: Ghost touch
properties.description: No penalty to interacting with the ghosts and daemons of the keyed world.

properties.name: Ka-shell
properties.description: Grants +1 ka.

globlobber.name: Glob Lobber
globlobber.flavor: Fires globs of rapidly expanding glue.

properties.name: Long reload
properties.description: Must take a full round to reload between shots.

properties.name: Sticky
properties.description: On hit: target is stuck. While stuck, they have [-] to ha defense and cannot move. They must spend two actions to unstick themselves. On crit: two targets become stuck together.

properties.name: Strange ammo
properties.description: costs 1 Supply to refill tank after each combat.

go-juice.name: Go-Juice
go-juice.flavor: Fizzy metallurgic fluid from the Prison Star drinks refineries.

properties.name: Energy
properties.description: [+] to strenuous, adrenaline-fuelled physical tests.

properties.name: Not people
properties.description: After many tests, conclusively not people.

properties.name: Sustenance
properties.description: It has what plants and animals crave. A pack a day.

properties.name: Toxic
properties.description: Regular use causes neuropathy and leaf blight.

godsbod.name: Godsbod
godsbod.flavor: Animalcular extension of the Sun God’s perfect form brings perfection to whoever partakes of it.

properties.name: Addictive
properties.description: Hard test. Purely psychological, but who would not want to stay forever perfect?

properties.name: Beauty
properties.description: +5 charisma.

properties.name: Health
properties.description: Immunity to disease.

properties.name: Vigor
properties.description: [+] to physical tests.

properties.name: Youth
properties.description: Temporary.

goggles,protectivereflective.name: Goggles, Protective Reflective
goggles,protectivereflective.flavor: Mirrored Iksan-style goggles protect from dust, shrapnel, and gaze attacks.

properties.name: Eye-ward
properties.description: [+] vs blinding.

properties.name: Un-gazed
properties.description: [+] vs gaze attacks.

ghosttonic.name: Ghost Tonic
ghosttonic.flavor: Eerily glowing amber spirits tasting of smoke and regret.

properties.name: Growth
properties.description: A stat permanently increases by +2.

properties.name: Decay
properties.description: A physical stat permanently decreases by -1 to a minimum of 0. If all physical stats are at 0, the tonic offers no further benefits.

properties.name: Dangerous
properties.description: Moderate test to avoid corruption.

ghoulbreaker.name: Ghoulbreaker
ghoulbreaker.flavor: Blessed bullets to end the dead.

properties.name: Anti-undead
properties.description: Double damage vs all types of undead.

properties.name: Pumpkin demolition
properties.description: Doubles all critical damage.

glidingvest“sclopetarius”.name: Gliding Vest “Sclopetarius”
glidingvest“sclopetarius”.flavor: Woven of hundreds of spinnerets linked by a distributed sensorioum and linked directly to the user’s lymph and blood streams. The gliding vest deploys inflated silken “wing bubbles”, allowing the user to glide like a diaphanous horror from before the Fall.

properties.name: Feeding
properties.description: Must drain 1 life to recharge after use.

properties.name: Glide
properties.description: Like a pheasant or mallard. Better gliding vests, like the “cryodrakon” model, cost at least twice as much.

properties.name: Toggle
properties.description: Can be set to deploy automatically if the user falls, or by activating the vest papillae.

gloriousgala.name: Glorious Gala
gloriousgala.flavor: A lavish celebration to permanently cement one of the arriviste adventurers as a member of the bestfolk.

properties.name: Cemented celebrity
properties.description: The hero throwing the gala permanently gains +1 ka or ba defence from self-confidence. Each time they want to gain this benefit again, the gala costs are doubled.

properties.name: Fête
properties.description: Once celebrated, it is done.

glottorc.name: Glottorc
glottorc.flavor: A torc and earbud traditional daemon set for translating unknown languages. Its magnificent configuration of crystalline chips embedded in a Late Preservationist matrix of stolid matter runs a full-turing soulless personality specialized in real-time multi-thread translations.

properties.name: Classicist
properties.description: The standard glottorc daemon speaks and translates all the verified blue-check classical languages. It requires a couple of hours to learn derived languages. To learn entirely new languages the glottorc requires a significant data set or about a week.

properties.name: Semisentient
properties.description: May acquire personality after much use.

properties.name: Sixty Four Voices
properties.description: The glottorc can translate up to 64 distinct voices at once, threading them faultlessly into the ambient soundscape.

gnosticmystery.name: Gnostic Mystery
gnosticmystery.flavor: A Truth resides within the hero, a terrible fate awaiting its opportunity to emerge and tear down the gates of Bāb-ilim.

properties.name: Permanent
properties.description: Cannot be removed from a character's inventory.

properties.name: Whispers
properties.description: Can only affect adjacent targets.

godribgoo.name: Godrib Goo
godribgoo.flavor: Some of the old gods were very large, and their bones continue to leak toxic red tar.

properties.name: Calciferous
properties.description: Soft tissues to bone.

properties.name: Contact
properties.description: Charisma test or [-] to agility and strength tests as affected area stiffens and calcifies.

properties.name: Ingested
properties.description: 3-5 days: racking pain, [-] to tests. Then: body ossifies.

goldenhammer.name: Golden Hammer
goldenhammer.flavor: These glittering weapons of pure-printed novalloy are used as currency by the tribes of Newo Georgioi, who till the lands in mock agrarian idyll under the commanding gaze of the autofac Great Printer Marcus IV. The hammers are decent weapons, but the self-repairing novalloy can only be reforged into other objects by true oldtech autofacs.

properties.name: Impressive
properties.description: Pretty intimidating (deals ba damage).

properties.name: Versatile
properties.description: Wielded two-handed, it deals 1d12 damage.

golembow.name: Golem Bow
golembow.flavor: A war bow with a specialized full-arm golem harness that loads and draws the weapon for the archer. After the Steam Lords mandated augmented golem-multi-arm training for their free labourer caste from childhood, their piston archers revolutionized Long Sea warfare for a generation. Then the 3rd ansible revolution wiped out the Steam Lords.

properties.name: Arrows
properties.description: Arrows as ammunition.

properties.name: Autofire
properties.description: The golem full-arm can fire at a marked target as a free action once per round.

properties.name: Life-charged
properties.description: Wielder can spend 1 action and 1 life to translate their will through the golem harness into the arrow. The bow deals an additional 1d12 damage on the next attack.

properties.name: Ranged
properties.description: [-] vs far away targets.

gongofdoom.name: Gong of Doom
gongofdoom.flavor: When struck, the gong’s vibrations awaken the doomed and dispossessed. The echoes of their pain rush forth in a numbing blackened death growl.

properties.name: Carrier
properties.description: Requires a gong-bearer or an action to set up before use.

properties.name: Loud
properties.description: Not quiet.

properties.name: Numb with the realization of inevitable destruction
properties.description: Struck target loses 1 agility and aura.

properties.name: Omniattack
properties.description: Wielder attacks every adjacent and nearby [-] target with ears.

gracefulbeadedcumbersuit.name: Graceful Beaded Cumbersuit
gracefulbeadedcumbersuit.flavor: An ornate harness of amber bead necklaces. The ostentation clarifies the wearer is too important to actually spend their energy working … or walking much.

properties.name: Cumber
properties.description: [-] to physical activity.

happyrump®symbiotes.name: Happy Rump® Symbiotes
happyrump®symbiotes.flavor: Bio-modified airwhale barnacles have gravity and inertia damping properties. One symbiote reduces the apparent mass of a sack’s worth of matter ten-fold. Scraping the barnacle off an object after it has planted kills it.

properties.name: Terminal obsolescence
properties.description: The barnacle’s necrobiotic clock kills it 1 week after planting.

hardlightshield.name: Hard Light Shield
hardlightshield.flavor: A glittering personal force-shield of hard light bound to a projection bracer of true Sunrider design.

properties.name: Concealed
properties.description: At the push of a button, the force-shield disappears, leaving only the bracer.

properties.name: Reflective
properties.description: Wearer always takes minimum damage from energy attacks. 1-in-6 chance energy strikes rebound into a random nearby target. 5-in-6 chance critical hits ricochet.

properties.name: Sun-forged
properties.description: When the wearer is bathed in UV radiation, all damage suffered is reduced [-].

properties.name: Vorpal edge
properties.description: Used as an improvised melee weapon deals 1d4 damage. Severs extremity on critical hit.

properties.name: Lodging
properties.description: On hit, harpoon is lodged in target. Target cannot move away while harpooned. Must spend a full round and take 2d6 damage to rip it out.

properties.name: Long reload
properties.description: Must take a full round to reload between shots.

harshestslander.name: Harshest Slander
harshestslander.flavor: So false, yet so believable. Amazing what swims in the gutters.

properties.name: Et tu, Brute
properties.description: Deals double damage to friends.

properties.name: Heart-breaking
properties.description: Target becomes vulnerable to ka or ba damage for the rest of the round.

hazardsuit.name: Hazard Suit
hazardsuit.flavor: Bulky layers of treated cloth and artificial leather sized to go over normal clothes.

properties.name: Hot
properties.description: [-] in hot environments.

properties.name: Secured
properties.description: Stop undead curses.

properties.name: Sterile
properties.description: [+] vs diseases.

headhelmet.name: Head Helmet
headhelmet.flavor: Made from the skull and skin of some kind of giant, alien, or engineer. Looks creepy.

properties.name: Magic-eating
properties.description: Spend 1d6 life to disperse & nullify a magical effect.

properties.name: Smelly
properties.description: Poor taxidermy or something worse? [-] to social tests.

healingsnakeoil.name: Healing Snakeoil
healingsnakeoil.flavor: Red oil slurry thick with chunks of health-snake (actually a leech).

properties.name: Vim
properties.description: Restores 2d4+1 life.

properties.name: Emetic
properties.description: One dose causes loud burping. Two, well …

heavydream.name: Heavy Dream
heavydream.flavor: Nightmares harvested from the ambient noösphere and fortified with swarm-builder seeds.

properties.name: Dark foreboding
properties.description: Target gains a menacing burden. The burden lets its victim reroll one die of their choice, at any time. The burden then disappears. Not all prophecies are false.

properties.name: Nightmare
properties.description: Exhausting dreams. Target loses 1 mental stat.

properties.name: Sleep
properties.description: Aura test or fall asleep.

herbalremedy,traditionalist.name: Herbal Remedy, Traditionalist
herbalremedy,traditionalist.flavor: Pungent translucent grease. Nominally not superstitious.

properties.name: Palliative
properties.description: Character ignores a burden from venom, bugs, parasites, diseases, rashes, and blisters.

hero'sbadge.name: Hero's Badge
hero'sbadge.flavor: A heart shackled in the four spears of destiny, a soul broken upon the trifold wheel, a person given whole to the service of the Motherfatherland.

properties.name: Intimidating
properties.description: This official proof of honourable sacrifice for the local cause gives [+] to intimidation tests.

properties.name: Cringing compliance
properties.description: Target gains [+] to their next test by following the hero's barked orders.

heroicepic.name: Heroic Epic
heroicepic.flavor: A majestic tale, recited, sung, quoted and much-loved. Uniquely spun to highlight the hero's role in restoring the ancient glories.

properties.name: Pearls of wisdom
properties.description: Once per session, a hero can read the tome for an hour and spend 1d6 life to remove one mental burden.

properties.name: Homely welcome
properties.description: Where it is loved, the epic's recital wins welcome, hearth, sleeping bag, ration bread, and lentil wine.

hiddenstalkerring.name: Hidden Stalker Ring
hiddenstalkerring.flavor: The ring-shaped focus for a hacked reality encoder spirit uses ghost tendrils to enhance (hĳack) the wearer's nervous system and project a chameleon field.

properties.name: Chameleon field
properties.description: Ring grants [+] to hiding and sneaking.

properties.name: Singular
properties.description: Only one copy of this item benefits the wearer.

holybreadbeer.name: Holy Breadbeer
holybreadbeer.flavor: Thick beer swimming with motile chunks. It’s food and water in a single nifty package.

properties.name: Sustenance
properties.description: A day’s food and drink for a baseline human.

properties.name: Powerful
properties.description: +1 strength.

properties.name: Jolly
properties.description: [-] to agility tests.

holyheartbreaker.name: Holy Heartbreaker
holyheartbreaker.flavor: In times of ultimate need, the neo-paladines weaponize the relics of their saints.

properties.name: Drop
properties.description: Named target tests aura (difficult) or their heart stops as they are confronted with the existential enormity of their failures before the all-creation.

properties.name: Named
properties.description: Each magic bullet must be inscribed with a true name.

properties.name: Stop
properties.description: Named target loses an action.

home'ssoil.name: Home's Soil
home'ssoil.flavor: A soul-jar of dirt grounds the bearer and reminds them of their roots. Their colourful curses reverberate with the memories of long-forgotten earths.

properties.name: Bloody roots
properties.description: Hero can spend 1d6 life to reroll a test.

properties.name: Rooted
properties.description: +1 ha and ka defence.

homespunwisdom.name: Homespun Wisdom
homespunwisdom.flavor: Their head is full of grandmother Org's old sayings about the wars in heaven and the fate of the soldiers of the Viles and the Lings.

properties.name: Peacemaking
properties.description: A target defeated by homespun wisdom offers parley and peace.

properties.name: Permanent
properties.description: Cannot be removed from a character's inventory.

homewardbound.name: Homeward Bound
homewardbound.flavor: As the mirror breaks, a misty hopping portal opens, leading back to where it was forever bound. The portal mouth dissipates after a minute or so.

properties.name: Bound
properties.description: The wielder binds the mirror to a location by spending 181 days and performing the daily domestic rites. The mirror can only be bound once.

properties.name: Misty spirit hop
properties.description: The journey home through the portal takes 1d4* days.

properties.name: Out of mind
properties.description: The voyage makes the spirits fly and removes one mental burden.

properties.name: Whoah
properties.description: The travellers arrive at their destination confused, suffering [-] to cognitive tests.

horaniwarmaul.name: Horani War Maul
horaniwarmaul.flavor: A big two-handed mace forged from the brainstone and neural column of an Iron War golem. Fortunately, few of those wrecks remain in the Horaberg Colline Mountains, the traditional homeland of the Horani radical machinist collectives.

properties.name: Big
properties.description: [-] in confined spaces.

properties.name: Clumsy
properties.description: [-] to attacks when wielded by normal-sized people.

properties.name: Two-handed
properties.description: Yes.

hypercomplicatedwatch.name: Hypercomplicated Watch
hypercomplicatedwatch.flavor: One never actually owns a rhodium diamond-encrusted pure-luxe watch. One only rents it from the bank with the surplus value borrowed from one’s tenant bond warehouse workers.

properties.name: Class resistance
properties.description: Reduces damage [-] from all lower-class creatures, regardless of level.

ideallever.name: Ideal Lever
ideallever.flavor: Concepts of constructed reality welded into an engineer’s sceptre. Theoretically, it is infinitely long and massless.

properties.name: Leverage
properties.description: [+][+] to tests that require a lever to move an object. Fulcrum recommended.

properties.name: Reified idea
properties.description: Wielder can spend 1 life to hide the rigid rod in their mind. Retrieving it costs another life point. The lever continues to occupy an inventory slot while in the wielder’s mind.

ignisflare.name: Ignis Flare
ignisflare.flavor: Rough chitinous rod filled with agitated luminous animalcules. Activated by striking.

properties.name: Bone fire
properties.description: Blazes like a bonfire for an hour. Adjacent targets suffer 1d6* fire damage per round.

properties.name: Fwoosh
properties.description: Flare deals 2d6* additional damage when first struck.

iksanheatray.name: Iksan Heat Ray
iksanheatray.flavor: A ruby wand encased in a bakelite and ironwood amplifier casing. Originally mass-produced by the Reasonable Army, new heat-rays are usually ornate one-offs produced by crystal wizards for the luxury laser hunting market.

properties.name: Infrared
properties.description: Sustained fire ignites.

properties.name: Power curve
properties.description: Stronger at short range, dealing more damage [+] to adjacent targets.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Prefers red zircon crystal batteries.

properties.name: Ranged
properties.description: [-] vs far away targets.

iksanlevellersuit.name: Iksan Leveller Suit
iksanlevellersuit.flavor: Brightly coloured plates of ceramic threaded with silvery metallic links.

properties.name: Chromatyped
properties.description: [-] to damage from sources of one of the six sacred colours.

properties.name: Jade essence
properties.description: Sacrifice jade mod to absorb a burden instead of suffering it. Suit continues to function, but the mod is lost.

iridescentbodypaint.name: Iridescent Body Paint
iridescentbodypaint.flavor: Really it’s just petroleum jelly with powdered iridescent glitter. But it certainly looks posh to a certain class of human.

properties.name: Goniochrome
properties.description: Treat as any colour for reducing magical effects.

properties.name: Jar
properties.description: Consumable. 20 uses.

properties.name: Washes off
properties.description: Especially with oil.

ironminotaursuit.name: Iron Minotaur Suit
ironminotaursuit.flavor: A monstrosity of godmeat and bronze cooked up in the churning crypt vats of the Living Flesh God.

properties.name: Large
properties.description: [-] to physical activities in confined spaces.

properties.name: Permanent
properties.description: The biomech bonds with the wearer's flesh and bone. Removing it deals 3d10 damage and imposes a burden or permanently reduces a stat by 1.

properties.name: Recycling
properties.description: [+] against the effects of dehydration and starvation.

properties.name: Smelly
properties.description: [-] on social tests.

properties.name: Strength servos
properties.description: +6 strength.

properties.name: Vital 30
properties.description: Grants 30 life.

properties.name: Weaponized
properties.description: Deals 1d10 damage with unarmed attacks.

jollyponcho.name: Jolly Poncho
jollyponcho.flavor: A bright yellow poncho with a hood. The edges are trimmed with geometric patterns and russet tassels.

properties.name: Fortune in misfortune
properties.description: Wearer gains a boon [+] when they suffer damage. May be spent at will.

justiceskull.name: Justice Skull
justiceskull.flavor: A serious skull wired with silver and embossed with turquoise and malachite. Its eyes and mouth emit rays of judgement.

properties.name: Demon brand
properties.description: Each time a demon, undead creature, or other chaotic horror is struck, it suffers a burden of justice. Champions of righteousness gain +1 to attack and damage for each such brand the creature bears. One brand disappears with each moonrise.

properties.name: Short-range
properties.description: [+] vs adjacent targets, [-] vs near targets. Cannot hit faraway targets.

properties.name: Sin-borne
properties.description: Deals minimum damage to targets without sin.

kilotonic.name: Kilotonic
kilotonic.flavor: Distilled infinity in a can. One dose per two pig-sized objects.

properties.name: Mind over matter
properties.description: Unwilling targets: hard charisma test to avoid their petrified destiny.

properties.name: One thousand-year trip
properties.description: The sprayed objects become as stone, nearly unaffected by entropy, and embark on a thousand-year one-way voyage into the future.

properties.name: Thousand-thousand years •
properties.description: undefined Using an entire spray on a single target sends it a million years into the future as a statue of nearly pure black non-interactive matter, immune to all damage, even the fusion core of a star.

kompleks.name: Kompleks
kompleks.flavor: Entropy reverses. Complexity increases. The broken is made whole. The divided is united.

properties.name: Mend
properties.description: A broken thing is fixed.

properties.name: Merge
properties.description: Two separate things are merged into a single thing.

properties.name: Wheels
properties.description: Ingested, a brain is re-ordered. User gains +1 thought.

properties.name: Within Wheels
properties.description: Used to cast futures, a fate is set. A target gains a burden of future history, composed of three hero dice and three antihero dice (to spend aiding an opponent). When the dice are spent and a life is forever altered, the burden dissipates.

labyrinthjewel.name: Labyrinth Jewel
labyrinthjewel.flavor: The higher-dimensional jewel sits in a palladium crown and blasts foes with mazing rays, trapping them in visceral figments of the wielder’s imagination.

properties.name: Hands-free
properties.description: It’s mind-operated.

properties.name: Mazing
properties.description: Struck targets are confused for the rest of the round, suffering [-] to physical dexterity and precise recall.

properties.name: Never leave
properties.description: Targets reduced to 0 life or struck for minimum damage are translated into a dimensional bubble maze haunted by the wielder’s subconscious. They return to the everyday world 2d12* days later through a sewer, a telephone box, or a magic shop. Forever after, they gain [+] to mental tests against the wielder whose deepest fears and desires they know.

properties.name: Ornate
properties.description: +2 ba defence.

leadendragonsuit.name: Leaden Dragon Suit
leadendragonsuit.flavor: A massive suit of malevolently sliding plates and spikes woven around a golem servo harness designed to augment the endurance of its wearer.

properties.name: Exoskeleton
properties.description: [+] to endurance and athletic tests.

properties.name: Golem harness
properties.description: +4 endurance.

properties.name: Reactive
properties.description: Deals 2d6 ha damage to attacker when struck.

properties.name: Vital 100
properties.description: Grants 100 life.

levi-disc.name: Levi-Disc
levi-disc.flavor: A simple slipforce disc in a weighted net with buckles for attaching goods. Supports 1 sack and can be drawn with a leash.

properties.name: Levitating
properties.description: Floats 0.84 metres above any surface.

properties.name: Leash
properties.description: So it doesn’t float away.

properties.name: Smooth
properties.description: As soap.

life’sblood.name: Life’s Blood
life’sblood.flavor: Concentrated life-blood from a mortal—or from a heart-vine spliced with baseline human source codes. The best is made by Exalted Hugrape Farms Industries Ltd. on the harnessed aeroliths of Sane’s Elysium in the unreformed vintner lord holdings of the southern Red Lands.

properties.name: Vita
properties.description: Restores 1d4+1 life to mortals or 20 life to the undead.

properties.name: Wings
properties.description: For the rest of the round, an undead drinker gains 1 action and [+] to all tests.

lifedrinker.name: Lifedrinker
lifedrinker.flavor: Swiftly decaying coils of metaphysical force that transfer life force from target to user.

properties.name: Lifesteal
properties.description: User gains damage dealt. Vampires gain double. Cannot exceed normal life total.

lifterskeleframe.name: Lifter Skeleframe
lifterskeleframe.flavor: Basic exoskeleton for loading and unloading cargo.

properties.name: Fragile
properties.description: Received crits break the frame.

properties.name: Load-bearing
properties.description: Add PRO to tests of strength.

properties.name: Power spike
properties.description: Pay 1d6 life or consume a charge of energy: gain [+] to a test of strength

lignumvitaebattle stick.name: Lignum Vitae Battle Stick
lignumvitaebattle stick.flavor: Carved and polished from the glowing heartwood of the heavy tree, the stick sinks in water. Widely used as a “compliance tool” by the imperial uplifters of the Four Sky Regency, it has remained a traditional badge of rank among the officer-chiefs of the regency camelherder tribes of the Pale Plains beyond the Yellowland.

properties.name: Less lethal
properties.description: Though marketed as non-lethal, this is a lie. Still, victims gain [+] to death tests after being whacked by the LVBS.

limbbacksystem.name: Limbback System
limbbacksystem.flavor: A human-portable biomechanical flesh-mass facility first developed for soldiers during the Eternal Struggle (235–325 Yu-Yu).

properties.name: Dangerous
properties.description: May cause mutations. Trivial corruption test recommended.

properties.name: Regrow
properties.description: Regenerates a lost limb in a few hours. Regenerated heads lose memories—the character rerolls mental stats.

liquidsentience.name: Liquid Sentience
liquidsentience.flavor: Over a few hours, the liquid sentience machines swiftly uplift a creature. A plant becomes as intelligent as an octopus, a dog becomes as smart as an astrophysicist. A human gains a thought score of 6.

properties.name: Cosmic masters
properties.description: When the ghost moon rides the sky, voices whisper from the void with instructions for an alien machine.

properties.name: Madness
properties.description: Aura test or the user becomes incomprehensible to its former peers.

properties.name: Years
properties.description: Wears off after a few years and must be re-applied.

littledeath.name: Little Death
littledeath.flavor: A perky void-worm cultivated in the weightless autofarms of the bright reaches of the sky.

properties.name: Sensation
properties.description: The void-worm attaches to a nervous system and overloads it with sensation. The target experiences a moment.

properties.name: Shutdown
properties.description: The target falls into a Consumables: Nocives “It’s only poison if you admit it is poisonous.” —Yu E Mua, mind-over-matterite philosopher, Last Words. While doctors cure, there are times when a sapient cancer must be excised from the body politic for the greater good. That is where the nocives come in. 155 coma for a week. Its spirit and personality are also quiescent for the duration.

properties.name: Undetectable
properties.description: The target shows no life, soul, or personality signs.

livingsoulscanner.name: Living Soul Scanner
livingsoulscanner.flavor: A rapid full-soul emitter hooked up to a high resolution 4-colour CRT orb.

properties.name: Flash scan
properties.description: Scans a nearby area and plots a 2-dimensional representation of current souls (ka) within the area (1 action).

properties.name: Soul ping
properties.description: The emitter sweeps all six directions, one per action. The scanner pings when souls are detected within a long range. The pitch and frequency of the ping represent the strength and size or number of the souls.

logicalconsequences.name: Logical Consequences
logicalconsequences.flavor: The wizardly logic of the overeducated can flense a fool from their freedom.

properties.name: Permanent
properties.description: Cannot be removed from a character's inventory.

properties.name: Puzzling
properties.description: [+] to solving puzzles.

longeyefusil.name: Longeye Fusil
longeyefusil.flavor: A sniper rifle made to the specifications of the golem fusiliers by the drone human fabricators of the Crust Belt.

properties.name: Ammunition
properties.description: Brass cartridges.

properties.name: Long-Range
properties.description: Attacks nearby and far away targets normally. [-] vs adjacent targets.

properties.name: Precise
properties.description: [+] to attacks if wielder is not jostled that round.

lucitespell-breaker.name: Lucite Spell-Breaker
lucitespell-breaker.flavor: A small club or truncheon of pure lucite reinforced with sinew and copper bands.

properties.name: Break spell
properties.description: Wielder can sacrifice the spell-breaker to negate one spell targeting them.

luminousspear.name: Luminous Spear
luminousspear.flavor: A glowing two-handed weapon favoured by the Bund-Bund warriors of the technopapacy.

properties.name: Luminous
properties.description: Increased damage [+] to creatures of darkness.

properties.name: Spirit-ward
properties.description: Grants 1 ka defence.

properties.name: Two-handed
properties.description: Left and right.

machineaccessdeck.name: Machine Access Deck
machineaccessdeck.flavor: A mechanical keyboard with living interface tentacles.

properties.name: Journal
properties.description: Records keystrokes. Includes full emotion glyph set.

properties.name: Living interface
properties.description: [+] to controlling connected machines.

machineghostbelt.name: Machine Ghost Belt
machineghostbelt.flavor: Looping, coiling links of living machine corpses, still sparkling with the ghosts of ancient sapience subroutines.

properties.name: Ghost weave
properties.description: All incoming ka damage is reduced [-].

magnificentfireballpistol.name: Magnificent Fireball Pistol
magnificentfireballpistol.flavor: One of the most stupidly overpowered inventions ever fed into an autofac production matrix. The fireball wandpistol converts the dross of mortal life force into powerful balls of fire. Hardly a fair trade in the eyes of the noble land barons.

properties.name: Explosive
properties.description: Damages creatures and objects adjacent to the target.

properties.name: Life-charged
properties.description: The wielder spends 1 life to fire.

properties.name: Ranged
properties.description: [-] vs far away targets.

maker“stvaritelj”.name: Maker “Stvaritelj”
maker“stvaritelj”.flavor: Converts energy and ideas into physical reality.

properties.name: Creation
properties.description: Used to materialize one object (1 st) per day.

properties.name: Idea drain
properties.description: Each use costs 1 mental stat point.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Omnibatteries are best, but a treadmill will also do.

malachitegolemsuit.name: Malachite Golem Suit
malachitegolemsuit.flavor: A composite suit of polished semi-magical stone and woven layers of force magic designed to counter massed firearms. The coiling, gurgling force fields seem to cover the suit in rippling waves of viscous liquid.

properties.name: Force field
properties.description: Incoming high velocity & energy attacks suffer [-].

properties.name: Strength servos
properties.description: +5 strength.

properties.name: Vital 30
properties.description: Grants 30 life.

many-handed.name: Many-handed
many-handed.flavor: Like a synthetic cuttlefish, the many-handed ammo erupts into grabby ar-life tentacles.

properties.name: Grappling
properties.description: Target is enmeshed in lively tentacles. [-] to physical tests. Strength test to break.

properties.name: Grabbing
properties.description: Tentacles also latch onto adjacent creatures and objects. [-] to physical tests. Strength test to break or thought test to untangle.

mepuppet.name: Me Puppet
mepuppet.flavor: A lovely golem suit that changes appearance to look just like a prettier version of its wearer.

properties.name: Beautiful
properties.description: 4 charisma. Replaces wearer’s stat while worn.

properties.name: Full-golem
properties.description: Can act independently of the wearer. About as smart as a domestic synth.

properties.name: Jealous streak
properties.description: The suit’s sentience simulation routines wish they were a real person.

properties.name: Vital 10
properties.description: Grants 10 life.

mechanicalbrain.name: Mechanical Brain
mechanicalbrain.flavor: Can store a personality-copy. Interfaces with most golems and machines. Great for playing chess or having a synthetic friend to talk to on a floating desert island.

properties.name: Calculator
properties.description: [+] to math tests.

properties.name: Direct interface
properties.description: [+] to controlling connected machines.

properties.name: Memory storage
properties.description: Stores data and records with only minute errors and reality breakdowns.

memoryseedcake.name: Memory Seed Cake
memoryseedcake.flavor: Made with the roasted spores of memory mushrooms growing in the skulls of wizardly ancestors.

properties.name: Magificent
properties.description: User immediately acquires a random spell nesting in their skull. It can be cast as normal, but it is extremely hard to capture and actually study.

properties.name: Motor tremors
properties.description: Until the spell is cast, the user suffers [-] to agility.

properties.name: Sustenance
properties.description: A day’s food for a true wizard. Or some kind of elf.

metapoison.name: Metapoison
metapoison.flavor: Dead swarm-builders and bacteri-facs ground to sparkly fragments and reactive chemistry.

properties.name: Ingested
properties.description: Endurance test or [-] to physical tests for a week.

properties.name: Inhaled
properties.description: Easy endurance test or [-] to all tests for a day. Natural 7: hallucinations and permanently gains 1 aura (once per sophont).

properties.name: Intravenous
properties.description: [-] to all tests for a week. Then: harsh endurance test or disabled for an hour.

mimesaflowercream.name: Mimesa Flower Cream
mimesaflowercream.flavor: Swirling, motile cosmetics made with refined dream-pods from the Thinker Tree.

properties.name: Lift personality
properties.description: Fresh mimesa, applied to a corpse or a sleeping creature, steals one of its skills or traits. The ‘full’ mimesa acquires a rich, greasy, ectoplasmic feel.

properties.name: Share personality
properties.description: A living creature smeared with ‘full’ mimesa absorbs the skill or trait suspended within the cream.

properties.name: Translation shock
properties.description: Moderate thought test or the recipient of the new attribute suffers a burden of confusion ([-] to thought tests for a week or so).

mininglaser.name: Mining Laser
mininglaser.flavor: Great for melting rock, steel, and flesh.

properties.name: Continuous fire
properties.description: Each subsequent attack against the same target deals one size larger damage die.

properties.name: Critical sever
properties.description: On crit: sever a limb or other small body part.

mirror-of-heaven.name: Mirror-of-Heaven
mirror-of-heaven.flavor: A cerulean mirror hung on fine chains of woven unicorn sinew in and the tears of the starborn.

properties.name: Fragile
properties.description: Physical damage is likely to break the mirror. Comes with a 2 stone protective plastic and foam case.

properties.name: Spell-reflector
properties.description: The wearer can spend 1d4 life to roll a ka or ha counterattack as a free action when a wizard casts a spell at them. If they beat the attacker’s roll, the spell is reflected back against its caster.

monochromesuit.name: Monochrome Suit
monochromesuit.flavor: Harlequin suit in shifting patterns of black and white. Tight and bulky by turns.

properties.name: Colour leeching
properties.description: Everything near the wearer turns to grey.

properties.name: Phasing
properties.description: Just like colour, the wearer is not quite in this world. Ha attacks against them suffer [-].

mostusefulwarrant.name: Most Useful Warrant
mostusefulwarrant.flavor: The quill of the law is a sharp sword in the righteous fist.

properties.name: Reputation's stain
properties.description: Target's allies suffer [-] if they help them.

motherbubble.name: Mother Bubble
motherbubble.flavor: A bubble of coördinated reality that clones existing mind-matter-spirit units. Used as a high-velocity cloning system during the Endless March.

properties.name: Entanglement
properties.description: A mothered clone’s perception of space-time is always loosely entangled with its model. It gains [+] when what the model sees and experiences (or saw and experienced) would be helpful. If the model dies, a clone suffers a permanent burden of existential nullity.

properties.name: Volume = Time^10
properties.description: It takes a day to clone a human-sized unit of mind-matter-spirit. A unit half the size takes an hour, a unit twice as large takes a week.

mouthofgod.name: Mouth of God
mouthofgod.flavor: The portable solid hologram projector manifests a divine progenitor to smite the unbelievers. Or, at least, scare gullible fools out of their wits.

properties.name: Burning
properties.description: The fiery hologram sets objects on fire.

properties.name: Loud
properties.description: Nobody will stay seated for this jump scare.

properties.name: Bright
properties.description: Very visible.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: 3 charges. Uses basic microfusion batteries, soul pearls, or 1d6 life and a few minutes for direct transfusion.

properties.name: Scary
properties.description: [+] to intimidate.

properties.name: Two-handed
properties.description: Requires two hands to operate the knobs and levers.

properties.name: Full burst
properties.description: Can increase damage dice by 3, but must reload before firing again.

properties.name: Jamming
properties.description: On a natural 1 roll, the weapon jams. Must take a full round to unjam.

necronomictome.name: Necronomic Tome
necronomictome.flavor: A bulky book that promises life eternal. It lies.

properties.name: Adeptus
properties.description: Reduces magic cost of necromantic spells by 1 (minimum of 1).

properties.name: Undead army
properties.description: Reduces spell price of imbued necromantic spells by 3.

nemeanskin.name: Nemean Skin
nemeanskin.flavor: The luxurious pelt of a now-dead divine creature reflects both literal and metaphorical arrows.

properties.name: Bullet-blocker
properties.description: Reduces all missile and ranged damage [-].

neoprimitivebow.name: Neoprimitive Bow
neoprimitivebow.flavor: A hunting bow designed in a museum style from the lost ages.

properties.name: Arrows
properties.description: Arrows as ammunition.

properties.name: Ranged
properties.description: [-] vs far away targets.

properties.name: Two hands
properties.description: Requires at least two.

neurafuse.name: Neurafuse
neurafuse.flavor: The windup neural damping field emitter overwhelms most electrochemical systems smaller than 0.1 sophonts. In practice, it paralyzes bugs and vermin in a radius of a few metres. Creatures beyond the radius feel an unpleasant numbness and prefer to avoid the neurafuse sphere.

properties.name: Weaponized
properties.description: Theoretically (and illegally) a neurafuse could be supercharged to incapacitate human-level neural systems. Humans closer to the neurafuse would face a more difficult endurance test to remain active.

properties.name: Wind-up
properties.description: Needs winding once an hour to work.

nihiltablet.name: Nihil Tablet
nihiltablet.flavor: A tablet dug up from a long-extinct The robot witch used the labyrinth jewel to send their minds into an imaginary maze.. 145 civilization. It tells of the death of a utopia. Reciting the grime poem inflicts bleak despair.

properties.name: Soul-crusher
properties.description: Target also loses 1 aura or 2 charisma or 3 thought.

nu-faceaugment.name: Nu-face Augment
nu-faceaugment.flavor: A better face for a better you. Deep neural rewiring gives full control of one’s expressions and emotions.

properties.name: Conscious control
properties.description: [+] to charisma tests.

properties.name: Irremovable
properties.description: One cannot just take one’s face … off. If removed, the wearer’s skull, synthetic muscles, and titanium hard-points are revealed. [-] to social tests, [+] to terrify, intimidate, and frighten.

properties.name: Dangerous
properties.description: Easy thought test to implant the biomantic reactor. Very hard thought test to remove it without killing the host.

properties.name: Lifetime
properties.description: For three score and ten years the host needs no food nor air. Water still recommended.

nurealityprojector.name: Nureality Projector
nurealityprojector.flavor: The horrordeck projects a prerecorded 4-dimensional reality in a small area. Creatures in the field behave as though the illusion were real. Nureal floors support weight, waters drown, fires burn.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Burns batteries like crazy. Soul-juice is better.

properties.name: Pre-loaded
properties.description: With tropical beach, tranquil stream, gentle glade, crystal caverns, and elegant oldaristo drawing-room.

properties.name: Reality gap
properties.description: When a creature is hurt within the nureality overlay, their mind-spirit registers the error, and they test aura to detect the limits of the field.

properties.name: Switch
properties.description: A creature on a nureality bridge over an abyss will fall when the nureality is turned off.

properties.name: Vidy slot
properties.description: Can be loaded with new recordings.

obsidianchameleonsuit.name: Obsidian Chameleon Suit
obsidianchameleonsuit.flavor: A rough, pebbly synthetic skin overlaid on a fungal golem metaskeleton. Designed for agility and covert operations.

properties.name: Camouflaged
properties.description: Incoming ranged attacks suffer [-].

properties.name: Neurogolem
properties.description: +3 agility.

properties.name: Vital 60
properties.description: Grants 60 life.

officialcorpocratuniform.name: Official Corpocrat Uniform
officialcorpocratuniform.flavor: This complicated and cumbersome suit is completely unsuitable to the local climate. However, it does mark its wearer as a member of local society in good standing, willing to put in the effort to fit in.

properties.name: Indoorwear
properties.description: [+] to mental tests indoors.

properties.name: Membership
properties.description: [+] to social tests within local communities and affiliated corporations.

properties.name: Uncomfortable
properties.description: [-] to physical exertion.

properties.name: Stains easily
properties.description: Loses 1 defence from ha attacks that deal max damage or are a critical hit.

omnibattery.name: Omnibattery
omnibattery.flavor: Chunky, metallucite cylinders, heavy with undifferentiated potential energy.

properties.name: Anycharge
properties.description: Recharges a thing. The wire-folk even use it as food.

oldtechmetrignome.name: Oldtech Metrignome
oldtechmetrignome.flavor: Pocket-sized friendly vome-gnome created to make measuring the physical world easy.

properties.name: Autognomous
properties.description: Measures and records a location or an object without continuous instruction. Takes a few minutes.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Crank or omnibattery.

properties.name: Relative space
properties.description: Measures one physical dimension of an object or small area per action.

properties.name: Semistentient
properties.description: Available in three personalities: pedantic, punctilious, and supercilious.

properties.name: Universal clock
properties.description: Keeps time.

onyxghostsuit.name: Onyx Ghost Suit
onyxghostsuit.flavor: A ghost-infused golem suit of coiling onyx snakes and shifting spirit stones. As it moves, it whispers with hints of lives wasted and dreams destroyed.

properties.name: Aura booster
properties.description: +3 aura.

properties.name: Ghost stones
properties.description: Incoming ka damage is reduced [-].

properties.name: Vital 50
properties.description: Grants 50 life.

orangelandglitterplate.name: Orangeland Glitterplate
orangelandglitterplate.flavor: Flattering form-fitted breastplate of translucent ceramic reinforced with shards of hard light.

properties.name: Fashionable
properties.description: Also grant ba 2.

properties.name: Ornate
properties.description: [-] to ba damage taken.

organicmultiprocessor.name: Organic Multiprocessor
organicmultiprocessor.flavor: Uses radiation and heat rays to treat edible matter, destroying daemons of disease and decay.

properties.name: Good food
properties.description: Purifies enough food for 7 pig-sized creatures per day.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Crank or omnibattery.

originalfelixwhizz.name: Original Felix Whizz
originalfelixwhizz.flavor: A popular energy drink produced according to a secret recipe by the United Galactose Incorporated Autonomous Autofactory since before the last Re-Literacy when recorded history resumed. Cult mercers peregrinate to the factory machine where they make offerings of decorated paper in exchange for cargoes of original felix whizz. The sweet drink would be much cheaper were it not for the high cost of shipping it across Sabaea and Senaea before transhipment to the market ports.

properties.name: Addictive
properties.description: Trivial test. A drinker without their whizz feels like their wings have been trimmed. They act ‘pissy’, to use the clinical term, and suffer [-] on charisma and thought tests.

properties.name: Life-giving
properties.description: Grants 1d4 temporary life points.

properties.name: Overconfidence
