properties.description: Disinhibits, encourages boasting and a disregard for danger. [-] on social tests.

properties.name: Synth-loved
properties.description: Can serve as a battery substitute.

overlavishgift.name: Overlavish Gift
overlavishgift.flavor: An overpriced bottle of wine or an ornate colonial carving to make hosts feel inadequate.

properties.name: Gift
properties.description: Once given, it's gone.

patchworkvacsuit.name: Patchwork Vacsuit
patchworkvacsuit.flavor: Caution: check vacsuits for holes, tears, and faulty patches before spacewalk.

properties.name: Breather
properties.description: Wearer can breathe normally.

properties.name: Pressurized
properties.description: Wearer is immune to the effects of abnormal pressure.

properties.name: Thermoregulated
properties.description: Wearer is immune to the effects of abnormal temperature.

properties.name: Thin seal
properties.description: Incoming damage breaks the suit.

plasmaknife.name: Plasma Knife
plasmaknife.flavor: An artefact salvaged from fallen fast stars and stranded cities. Its luminous blade slices through wrought-iron like butter and sears flesh it touches.

properties.name: Grievous
properties.description: Ignores damage resistances.

properties.name: Overcharge
properties.description: With a bit of judicious hacking, the power dampers can be disabled. The blade flares out, dealing 4d4 damage, but suffering [-] to attacks. In this configuration, the plasma knife burns 3 charges per conflict.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Prefers dark crystal batteries.

personaegg.name: Persona Egg
personaegg.flavor: A jewel the size of a gecko’s egg implanted near the character’s central processing system. If their personality is changed or lost through body death or ultra-possession, the persona egg can restore it with less than 1.67% integrity loss.

properties.name: Implant
properties.description: Occupies a trait slot.

properties.name: Personality reset
properties.description: Character restores their mental state to their manual or daily restore point. This cancels any mental burdens or mental stat changes experienced since the point was created. This also wipes any intervening memories.

properties.name: Restart
properties.description: If the character is destroyed or personality wiped, the persona egg can rebuild a simulacrum in a clone or synthetic shell with the mental stats and memories stored at the restore point.

properties.name: Restore point
properties.description: Set daily at sunrise. Also stores one manual restore point.

personalcard.name: Personal Card
personalcard.flavor: Subtly off-white, tasteful thickness, even a watermark.

properties.name: Cut to size
properties.description: Hand out for 1d8 ba damage. Double vs Street street money types.

properties.name: Discrete
properties.description: Fits in a wallet.

properties.name: Pack
properties.description: Of 20 in a card case.

personalitypal.name: Personality Pal
personalitypal.flavor: An anatomically suggestive casque apparatus for fine tuning personality matrices. One effect per 6 hour session.

properties.name: Dangerous
properties.description: If used multiple times on a single individual.

properties.name: Improve
properties.description: User’s personality becomes malleable. They can change one of their personality traits, or remove an existing mental burden.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Crystal dreams.

properties.name: Shift
properties.description: Moves 1 mental stat point.

properties.name: Strengthen
properties.description: User gains a conviction trait that grants +3 ba and +1 ka defence.

petmakertmtreatdispenser.name: PetmakerTM Treat Dispenser
petmakertmtreatdispenser.flavor: Programmable pet treat creator with over 500 programmable volatile compounds!

properties.name: Treat!
properties.description: [+] to interactions with animals, including domestication.

photomeasure.name: Photomeasure
photomeasure.flavor: Handheld multi-spectrum measuring device, accurate to 10 km (depending on atmospheric interference). Capable of recording and storing the 4-dimensional layout of a middling space in a single flashing sweep of its iridescent beams.

properties.name: 3D map
properties.description: Handy in the ruins of a Purification era metro-bunker.

properties.name: Tripod (optional)
properties.description: Greater accuracy [+] when measuring, but needs a bit of prep. +1 stone.

planeprojector.name: Plane Projector
planeprojector.flavor: The handheld Ulfire & Octarine Ltd. hardlight projector is a masterpiece of lucent oldtech. It projects a chaotic probability wave that collapses into a plane of solid light a cubit across. Placed just right, the plane can decapitate a bull or deflect a bullet.

properties.name: Ammo
properties.description: Soul-fire. An action and 1d6 life to recharge when empty.

properties.name: Deflecting
properties.description: Wielder can spend 1 action and 1 life to interrupt and deflect an inbound ranged attack.

properties.name: Short-range
properties.description: [+] vs adjacent targets, [-] vs near targets. Cannot hit faraway targets.

properties.name: Vorpal
properties.description: Severs or destroys an extremity on a critical hit.

pleasureportal.name: Pleasure Portal
pleasureportal.flavor: A vile fae charm, the portal beckons its victims with a false heaven where all their urges are fulfilled.

properties.name: A heaven
properties.description: At 0 life, the portal’s victims are drawn like moths to a flame into its shimmer. They disappear for a month and a day. Most return, all burdens shed, all dreams extinguished, all passions slaked.

properties.name: Carrier
properties.description: Requires a portal-bearer or an action to set up before use.

properties.name: Clumsy
properties.description: [-] to attacks.

properties.name: Short-range
properties.description: [+] vs adjacent targets, [-] vs near targets. Cannot hit distant targets.

plushplus.name: Plush Plus
plushplus.flavor: Ago companion, pre-programmed with soothing words.

properties.name: Canned wisdom
properties.description: User spends an action consulting the plush to gain [+] on an oracle roll.

properties.name: Nightmare repellant
properties.description: User is resistant vs the attacks of nightmares and other sleep demons while holding the plush.

properties.name: Soothing
properties.description: Grants [+] vs fear.

pointyhelmet.name: Pointy Helmet
pointyhelmet.flavor: A fine helm with the razor sharp horn of a labmythical beast.

properties.name: Absorbing
properties.description: Hero can use it to negate the damage from 1 critical hit. This destroys the helmet.

properties.name: Pointy
properties.description: Deals 1d8 damage with a charge attack.

poisonedbribe.name: Poisoned Bribe
poisonedbribe.flavor: The worm hides an uncomfortable hook.

properties.name: On the hook
properties.description: Target gains €100 but suffers [-] to tests vs the wielder for the rest of the conflict.

properties.name: Gift
properties.description: Once given, it's gone.

polymorphicaccesscard.name: Polymorphic Access Card
polymorphicaccesscard.flavor: The oldtech card generator uses a pervasive mind-and-matter scanner paired with a decryptic node from a quantum void worm’s brain to generate digital access signals. Essentially, it makes keys to unlock ancient doors, chests, and devices.

properties.name: Adapt
properties.description: Easy mental test: card morphs to open a new lock.

properties.name: Blood screen error
properties.description: Critical fail: PAC performs a 5-minute reboot.

properties.name: Mind-blending
properties.description: Costs 1 mental point to use. The void worm node plays rough with the user’s brain.

properties.name: Short-term storage
properties.description: Card “remembers” up to 5 locks.

porcelainprincepanoply.name: Porcelain Prince Panoply
porcelainprincepanoply.flavor: A full suit of integrated ceramic-steel composite, best donned with the help of another polybody.

properties.name: Mobile
properties.description: Despite the weight, does not impede movement.

properties.name: Reflective
properties.description: Grants resistance to energy damage.

properties.name: Tinkling
properties.description: Clattering plates impose [-] to stealth tests.

portableshadow.name: Portable Shadow
portableshadow.flavor: A battle-hardened war shadow from the eternal struggle cloned and bound to protect. Don’t lose the leash.

properties.name: Anti-ghost
properties.description: Incorporeal attack damage reduced [-].

properties.name: Reactive
properties.description: Deals 1d4 ka damage to melee attackers.

poshaddress.name: Posh Address
poshaddress.flavor: It’s easy to show one lives in the good part of town: a few correctly branded luxury accessories, a passkey to the Tru-Hites gated community, and the constant burden of comparing oneself to one’s neighbours.

properties.name: Accessories
properties.description: Various bits and bobs can be put away in a 5 soap pouch for safekeeping. Grants no defence when stored this way.

puppet-maker.name: Puppet-maker
puppet-maker.flavor: Spiritual hooks to burrow into a target’s flesh and bring it under a new master.

properties.name: Delayed pain
properties.description: Target suffers damage when it refuses to follow the user’s instructions.

properties.name: Mindful
properties.description: Deals minimum damage to mindless targets.

properties.name: Strings
properties.description: [+] to attack a target that has already been struck by puppet-maker ammunition.

purplehaze.name: Purple Haze
purplehaze.flavor: The toke of choice for manly men. Made from the shredded bark of sentient trees (or shrubbery colonies) in the Three Sun sky forests, hence its common name: “essensa de mors.”

properties.name: Addictive
properties.description: Trivial test. A smoker without purple haze must suffer two burdens: cotton-mouth (no special effect) and brain fog (-1 thought and aura).

properties.name: Comfortably numb
properties.description: Removes pain and emotions. [+] to tests against pain, grief, fear, and hurt.

properties.name: Disorienting
properties.description: [-] to agility and aura tests.

quietplaice.name: Quiet Plaice
quietplaice.flavor: A meta-dimensional flatfish whose undulating fins deaden vibrations in a large area.

properties.name: Dehydrate
properties.description: Dried out, the place hybernates indefinitely. Add water to awaken.

properties.name: Quiet place
properties.description: No sounds or EM radiation penetrates the quiet spheroid. Light acquires a dull blue cast within the area.

properties.name: Swim away
properties.description: Once rehydrated, the quiet plaice swims away into its home dimensions, leaving behind a large spheroidal area of delayed vibration.

realitydistortionfield.name: Reality Distortion Field
realitydistortionfield.flavor: A harness of hell metals & heaven leathers that looks like particularly luxurious suspenders.

properties.name: Divine favour
properties.description: +4 charisma.

properties.name: Vocal upgrade
properties.description: [+] to convince, cajole and impress.

realitysiphon.name: Reality Siphon
realitysiphon.flavor: Higher-order reality interference waves bundled into a solid-state doom delivery package (SSDDP). The reality siphon damages a target’s connection with reality.

properties.name: Disconnect
properties.description: [-] to all rolls. Suffers [-] damage from all sources.

properties.name: Out of joint
properties.description: Target’s turn is always last in every round. Target loses 1 action per turn.

properties.name: Time, what is
properties.description: Action else-when. Apparent. Consequences. Unfolding. Another existence? The player reveals how the time-broken character set something (everything?) up in one future scene. Or the player gets five [+] after this scene.

re-lifesheath.name: Re-life Sheath
re-lifesheath.flavor: A friendly leech (?) derived creature discovered (?) by a party before it even departed on its void journey. It reconstitutes a dying individual in a new (?), harder, better, stronger, faster body. Errors have been reported.

properties.name: Better
properties.description: The new body increases one stat.

properties.name: Dangerous
properties.description: Causes corruption.

properties.name: Re-life
properties.description: Uses inert organic tissue to recreate a person, so long as it is not too decayed and has a mostly intact neural system.

properties.name: Void burden
properties.description: The re-lifed awaken with a strange song from the void that never quite leaves their hearing. Its meaning is unknown and doctors now treat it as mostly harmless.

redgodrobes.name: Red God Robes
redgodrobes.flavor: Elegantly fashionable robes in the second empire style ward off superstition, slander, and even the occasional stiletto.

properties.name: Commanding
properties.description: [+] to mental domination and charm attacks.

properties.name: Spell control
properties.description: Grants 2 levels for spell casting and corruption tests.

redlivingmail.name: Red Living Mail
redlivingmail.flavor: Chitinous, half-living armour of flowing arthropod links, infused with the biomancy of the Living Flesh God.

properties.name: Ancestral
properties.description: Also grants ka 2.

properties.name: Cool
properties.description: [+] to tests against heat effects but imposes [-] to physical tests in cold environments.

properties.name: Feeding
properties.description: The mail feeds on flesh to repair itself. Can gain mass, granting the wearer 5 temporary life per stone (max +10 life).

risqv.name: Risq V
risqv.flavor: A glitch developed from the universal stem code of creation. It blossoms like a surreal flower, bathing a large area in its effect.

properties.name: Critical V
properties.description: All natural d20 rolls of 1–5 are critical fails, 16–20 are critical successes.

saltyfountainof curses.name: Salty Fountain of Curses
saltyfountainof curses.flavor: A terrifying vocabulary acquired from the sailors of the Circle Sea, the Golden Desert pirates, and the lime nomads of the Ultraviolet Grasslands.

properties.name: Permanent
properties.description: Cannot be removed from a character's inventory.

properties.name: Wizard-breaking
properties.description: Deals double damage to any target that has cast a spell this round

scytheofjustice.name: Scythe of Justice
scytheofjustice.flavor: A scythe of gold anodized orgonium, symbolizing the prophesied final victory of the proletariat. If only somebody had not lost the instruction manifesto.

properties.name: Interrupt
properties.description: The wielder can spend 1d4 life to reroll their initiative using 1d12+8.

properties.name: Inspiration
properties.description: Leastfolk adjacent to the wielder gain [+] to one test per round.

sentimentalamulet.name: Sentimental Amulet
sentimentalamulet.flavor: A clasped metal bivalve with two holograms. One of the hero’s lineage princess-mother, the other of their memory city. Just having it near strengthens the soul.

properties.name: Singular
properties.description: Only one copy of this item benefits the wearer.

serpentstick.name: Serpent Stick
serpentstick.flavor: A walking stick carved into a serpent. Or a serpent pretending to be a stick.

properties.name: Autonomous
properties.description: Imbue 1 life to animate stick as a flying holy snake (L1) for the rest of the conflict. Giving the snake an order is an action. If directed to attack a target, it does so until destroyed or told otherwise.

properties.name: Venomous
properties.description: Struck target feels a mix of euphoria and numbness for the rest of the round. [+] against fear, [-] to agility and strength tests.

servemes.name: Servemes
servemes.flavor: What looks like rusted dust comes alive in its own magnetic field and attempts to repair machinery to suit the will of the Synthetic Deity.

properties.name: Energize
properties.description: Grants 10 bonus life to golems and synthetics.

properties.name: Repair
properties.description: Removes one burden overnight.

properties.name: Glitchy
properties.description: Trivial thought test to avoid vome infection.

shock-sword.name: Shock-sword
shock-sword.flavor: A composite amber and ceramic blade, rippling with electromagical fields. Neon knight gangs use decorated custom grips and colourful auras to stand out. Still, most shock-swords continue to be manufactured by a single levitating auto-factory called R.O.G.

properties.name: Boost
properties.description: Spend a charge to deal double damage for one round.

properties.name: Circuit breaker
properties.description: Deals increased damage [+] to synthetics.

properties.name: Mildly neuralgic
properties.description: Stuns on crit.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Uses most standard crystal batteries.

sidekickcape.name: Sidekick Cape
sidekickcape.flavor: It only looks fancy at first glance, but it does have some tricks.

properties.name: Glitzy
properties.description: Appears more valuable than it is; for the hero on a budget.

properties.name: Hero’s bond
properties.description: A hero gains [+] to damage against attackers who injure a sidekick wearing this cape.

siegetortoisesuit.name: Siege Tortoise Suit
siegetortoisesuit.flavor: A powerful suit originally developed for Izvoreni siege troopers during the slow wars of the time-space lens tunnels.

properties.name: Large
properties.description: [-] to physical activities in confined spaces.

properties.name: Siege hardpoints
properties.description: Wearer can wield large weapons with a single hand. They can wield a siege weapon two-handed.

properties.name: Strength servos
properties.description: +2 strength.

properties.name: Vital 50
properties.description: Grants 50 life.

siestanarcosis.name: Siesta Narcosis
siestanarcosis.flavor: A bouquet of dried turquoise weed that reeks of sage and freedom. Boiled into a heady brew.

properties.name: Panacea
properties.description: Immediately removes a physical burden.

properties.name: Tranquillity
properties.description: Puts the patient to sleep for many hours.

six-foldwand.name: Six-fold Wand
six-foldwand.flavor: The wand paints lines of reality-blurring fire with each strike. When the six lines align, a gate opens.

properties.name: Fold-break
properties.description: The wielder can spend a charge to break all the folds on a target. Each fold deals 1d6* ka damage.

properties.name: Gate
properties.description: When a target is painted with its sixth fold, a charge flares immediately, and the folds inflict 6d6* ka damage. A gate then opens through the target's earthly form, summoning an uncontrolled sixth-dimensional horror (L6).

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: 6 charges. Gains 1 charge per moonrise.

properties.name: Six-fold
properties.description: When the wand strikes a target, it paints them with a fold. The fold is an inert burden; it can be removed by a curse-breaker.

properties.name: Ranged
properties.description: [-] vs far away targets.

shamblewire.name: Shamblewire
shamblewire.flavor: Bobbin of living wire laced with post-mortal energies.

properties.name: Glitchy
properties.description: Trivial endurance test to avoid vome infection.

properties.name: Post-wired
properties.description: A corpse laced with the wire is reanimated. Depending on how long it has been dead, its ba (personality) may be wholly decayed.

properties.name: Pre-wired
properties.description: A living character laced with the wire loses 1 endurance but is immediately reanimated with 13 life when an injury kills them. They are now undead, a wire wight.

properties.name: Slow decay
properties.description: The wired decay ten times more slowly than normal corpses, losing 1 physical stat point or 1 charisma per week.

sledgehammer.name: Sledgehammer
sledgehammer.flavor: To the hammer, everything is a nail.

properties.name: Colossal
properties.description: Takes two actions to attack and requires two hands to wield.

properties.name: Critical throw
properties.description: On crit: human sized or smaller target is thrown into a nearby obstacle and knocked down.

properties.name: Stunning
properties.description: On hit: target loses an action.

slowdecay.name: Slow Decay
slowdecay.flavor: A creature or thing, abmortal or divine, is sentenced to slow decay.

properties.name: No death
properties.description: Yet, it is doomed never to die, till the sun evaporates, the seas freeze, the slowest stars wink out, and the eye of the Increate closes over this cosmos.

properties.name: Slow decay
properties.description: Over a century, the victim will decline to a state of complete decrepitude.

properties.name: Unsatisfied
properties.description: The target gains a burden of permanent nostalgia for a time when the grass was greener, and the light was brighter, and the days were sweeter. It can only be removed by vitality gained again, or the gift of a final death and a new turn on the grinding wheel of existence.

slow-forcebelt.name: Slow-Force Belt
slow-forcebelt.flavor: An intricately four-dimensional belt that dynamically fractures space-time around the wearer, projecting a slow-force field around them. The kinetic energies of physical attacks are dispersed and misdirected.

properties.name: Antikinetic
properties.description: Ha attacks deal reduced damage [-].

properties.name: Mildly aerostatic
properties.description: The roiling force field reduces the effect of gravity on the wearer, effectively making them four times lighter.

smugvest.name: Smug Vest
smugvest.flavor: This soft vest of finest silkwool patterned in a cosy hyggelogical comfort clan style is so snug it makes anyone a bit smug.

properties.name: Closed mind
properties.description: [+] against suggestions, charms, and influences.

properties.name: Self-satisfaction
properties.description: [-] to ba and ka damage from social inferiors.

sneerofcold command.name: Sneer of Cold Command
sneerofcold command.flavor: A combination of neuro-surgery, plastic enhancement, and time-honoured military training and harsh experience.

properties.name: Servile compliance
properties.description: Target gains [+][+] to their next test if they follow the hero's barked orders.

properties.name: Iron mind
properties.description: Sneering confidence grants +2 ha and ka defence.

snip&puff.name: Snip & Puff
snip&puff.flavor: Air squid hunters make the best sniff & puff from the spores of the aeraflorine puffer they catch with cobweb nets in the mist forests of the Alto Rosso above the Cyan Sea. Cheaper (and more addictive) S&P is also made from other types of motile air lichen.

properties.name: Addictive
properties.description: Easy test. An addict without snip & puff feels low and insecure. [-] to social tests.

properties.name: Euphoria
properties.description: Happiness keeps terror and shame away. Resistance to ka and ba damage [-].

properties.name: Hopping
properties.description: User gains 2 free actions to use during the scene.

societyofthe rightbulb.name: Society of the Rightbulb
societyofthe rightbulb.flavor: The lightbulb was not enough. They had to learn how to wield the serpent's voice.

properties.name: Change of heart
properties.description: If the target does not attack the wielder or their allies this round, they suffer minimum damage instead.

properties.name: Whispers
properties.description: Can only affect adjacent targets.

solarlamp.name: Solar Lamp
solarlamp.flavor: A magic lamp that eats sunlight to illuminate a small area. Perfected in the Long Ago, many fabricators and craft-golems grow these lamps from generative matrices to this very day. A day's worth of insolation gives a night's worth of illumination.

properties.name: Solar
properties.description: Feeds on sunlight.

soul-eaternightblade.name: Soul-eater Nightblade
soul-eaternightblade.flavor: The spirit of the Eater in Darkness dwells in this blade.

properties.name: Soul-stealer
properties.description: Reduces target’s level by 1 each time it hits.

properties.name: Mildly possessed
properties.description: The sword gibbers and talks to itself. Especially when silence would be more helpful.

souljuice.name: Soul Juice
souljuice.flavor: Ground in a soul mill and refined through an abyssal still. While the juice derived from the souls of political criminals works just as well, most abmortals prefer more innocent fare.

properties.name: A year
properties.description: Imbibed, the soul juice grants a year of youth.

properties.name: Burned
properties.description: Powers a mansion or village for a year.

properties.name: Cast
properties.description: A wizard gains bonus life equal to their maximum for spellcasting purposes only.

properties.name: Existential horizon
properties.description: Nothing then remains of the milled soul.

soulmill.name: Soul Mill
soulmill.flavor: A horrible mechanism left over from the world that was before souls were woven into this vast cosmos. It breaks down a creature’s soul, its ka, into its constituent quirks: up, left, strange, 171 right, down, known and more. The quirks then swiftly decay into constituent reality, releasing immense quantities of energy.

properties.name: Charging
properties.description: The flood of energy from a soul mill can be tapped to recharge omnibatteries.

properties.name: Ender
properties.description: Permanently destroys a living creature’s soul, leaving a ka-zombie. Sometimes used as a tool of judicial terror.

properties.name: Energy
properties.description: A single sentient soul provides enough energy for a largish settlement for a week.

soulspear.name: Soul Spear
soulspear.flavor: A spear that vibrates between realities leaves wounds that only the spirit can perceive.

properties.name: Ghost-ripper
properties.description: Deals double damage to incorporeal targets.

properties.name: Heartbreaker
properties.description: Deals double damage on critical hits.

properties.name: Two-handed
properties.description: Like a proper spear.

properties.name: Untraceable
properties.description: Leaves no mark.

sourcecoder.name: Source Coder
sourcecoder.flavor: An array of needles, beams, and swirling crystal satellites, which realigns the auras and biochemistry of a living creature. One effect per 6 hour session.

properties.name: Biomancer’s dream
properties.description: [+] to biomantic modification tests.

properties.name: Dangerous
properties.description: If used multiple times on a single individual.

properties.name: Improve
properties.description: User gains 1 physical stat point or removes an existing physical burden.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Hi-tek batteries.

properties.name: Safe mutation
properties.description: User gains a mutation. No corruption tests when used properly.

properties.name: Shift
properties.description: Moves 1 physical stat point.

properties.name: Mutagenesis
properties.description: Target tests endurance or loses an action as it suddenly (and painfully) gains a random mutation.

properties.name: Painful mutation
properties.description: The target suffers an additional 1d6* damage if it mutates.

spacemaker.name: Spacemaker
spacemaker.flavor: The symmetries of a cosmic portal bound into a glittering band. Too small for a person, the activated gate still distorts space and time.

properties.name: Distortion
properties.description: A small area adjacent to the activated spacemaker becomes very large. This can increase the available space inside, e.g., a telephone box.

properties.name: Letter-gate
properties.description: An object no larger than a rolled up memefiche can be passed through the gate.

spinningpendulum.name: Spinning Pendulum
spinningpendulum.flavor: The master hypnotist’s pendulum also hypnotizes ghosts and ghouls.

properties.name: Ranged
properties.description: [-] vs far away targets.

properties.name: Sensitive
properties.description: Must be restarted if the user is jostled or hurt.

properties.name: Set spinning
properties.description: Requires an action to get going.

properties.name: Suggestive
properties.description: [+] to charm and deception attack.

spiritpaste.name: Spirit Paste
spiritpaste.flavor: A paste of distilled ectoplasm, lucent lazuli, ancestor ashes, and eco palmate airwhale ambergris. The paste grants a semblance of invulnerability when painted onto bare skin. Each unit of paste smeared onto the skin occupies one inventory slot.

properties.name: Protection
properties.description: Grants 1 ha and ka defence per painted slot.

properties.name: Washes off
properties.description: Water and blood can wash away the paste. E.g., rain removes 1 unit of paste per hour.

properties.name: Spirit paste plus
properties.description: A more expensive version that uses undead ancestor ashes. Grants +2 ha and ka defence per painted slot, but costs €100.

spiritspectacles.name: Spirit Spectacles
spiritspectacles.flavor: Rather peculiar round tinted spectacles that gaze into the daemonic realm.

properties.name: Fragile
properties.description: Lose 1 defence when struck by a critical hit.

properties.name: Ghostsight
properties.description: Wearer can see spirits, daemons, and the invisible.

properties.name: Tinted
properties.description: Everything looks blue.

spirittestimony.name: Spirit Testimony
spirittestimony.flavor: Necromancer lawyers get the dead to talk. Their accusations can hurt.

properties.name: Chilling
properties.description: When used to deal ka damage, the target suffers [-] on its next test.

properties.name: Limited
properties.description: Functions like ammo.

statusoblong.name: Status Oblong
statusoblong.flavor: A digital daemon in a small personal phylactery with a glossy touchscreen. Promises to answer every question.

properties.name: Addictive
properties.description: Demands attention. [-] to concentration.

properties.name: Electric library
properties.description: [+] to knowledge tests and navigation.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Requires charging. Runs out at inopportune times.

steppe-shipcutlass.name: Steppe-ship Cutlass
steppe-shipcutlass.flavor: A masterpiece of precision engineering, the hilt holds an array of valuable tools: corkscrew, bottle opener, bread knife, butter spreader, saw, nail file, nail clipper, scissors, swappable screwdriver, wrench, magnifying lens, compass, and whistle.

properties.name: Sword-breaker
properties.description: The back of the cutlass is notched. Opponents with bladed weapons suffer an increased critical failure range (weapon breaks on a natural attack roll of 1 or 2).

properties.name: Tool
properties.description: Useful in many situations.

stim-catcoffee.name: Stim-Cat Coffee
stim-catcoffee.flavor: The finest stim-cat droppings roasted to perfection, mixed with seven spices and gold dust.

properties.name: Gold-laced
properties.description: Mineraloid gnomes and dragon-derivatives are jolted by the gold dust. After downing a shot, they immediately gain 1 free action to use during the scene. Additional cups cause violent jitters (-1 physical stat).

properties.name: Cat coffee
properties.description: Like most cat coffees, it restores 1 mental stat point and grants [+] to mental tests.

storminfantryshield.name: Storm Infantry Shield
storminfantryshield.flavor: A large shield to absorb and deflect blows, laced with diffusers to disperse energy attacks. Painted with vivid and terrifying designs to recall the lost immortals of old.

properties.name: Bashing
properties.description: Can be used as an improvised melee weapon to deal 1d4 damage or knock an opponent back.

properties.name: Breakable
properties.description: Can be sacrificed to negate damage from one attack.

strangledconfession.name: Strangled Confession
strangledconfession.flavor: The wizard-priest pours their most horrible, revolting, blasphemous sins into a bead bracelet. Then, they speak out their self-loathing as arrows of karmic force that injure the morals and soul of the listener.

properties.name: Consumable
properties.description: Each sin that is uttered destroys a bead. Eventually, the reservoir of revulsion will be exhausted.

properties.name: Degrading
properties.description: Damage dice are reduced one step each time they deal maximum damage. The blasphemy grows weaker with quantity.

properties.name: Listening world
properties.description: Each rank of the Veda of the Cosmic Logos increases damage dice 1 step.

properties.name: Painful
properties.description: Each sin uttered costs the confessor 1 life.

properties.name: Vulnerable
properties.description: All who hear the confession gain [+] to their next ba attack against the wizard.

stratohastur.name: Stratohastur
stratohastur.flavor: A forbidden and hellish guitar of horrors. Its victims fall stumbling through nameless aeons and inconceivable dimensions.

properties.name: Bound
properties.description: The stratohastur always returns to its wielder, even if destroyed or discarded.

properties.name: Dissonant
properties.description: Target suffers [-] on its next roll.

properties.name: Groovy
properties.description: [+] to musical tests.

properties.name: Nameless aeons
properties.description: When the wielder acquires a sixth yellow sign, they immediately disappear until the next session. They return changed, without the stratohastur or the yellow signs, but with a new random mutation.

properties.name: Yellow sign
properties.description: Whenever the wielder rolls a natural 13, they gain an inert yellow sign burden. This burden cannot be removed.

stuckforceshiv.name: Stuckforce Shiv
stuckforceshiv.flavor: A shard of fractured force field held in uneasy equilibrium by a stabilizer pearl bound in jade cement. These blades are the residue of magical struggles beyond what anyone could imagine today; some say they are the leftovers of creation itself.

properties.name: Vorpal edge
properties.description: On a crit severs slender extremities or inflicts a gushing wound (burden).

properties.name: Ammo
properties.description: Oldworld brass cartridges.

properties.name: Concealed
properties.description: [+] hide weapon.

properties.name: Ranged
properties.description: [-] vs far away targets.

properties.name: Stiletto
properties.description: Can be used as a knife, dealing 1d4 damage.

symboloffate.name: Symbol of Fate
symboloffate.flavor: Simple symbols yet hold power to sway and frighten.

properties.name: Holy
properties.description: Deals double damage to unholy demons, wretched vampires, and the restless dead.

synthcrystalray rifle.name: Synth Crystal Ray Rifle
synthcrystalray rifle.flavor: Massive humming compressors and radiating batteries emit blistering energy pulses.

properties.name: Long-range
properties.description: Attacks nearby and far away targets without penalties. [-] vs adjacent targets.

properties.name: Power drop
properties.description: Double damage to adjacent targets and increased damage [+] to nearby targets.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Uses standard AA golem batteries.

syntheticfriendskeleton.name: Synthetic Friend Skeleton
syntheticfriendskeleton.flavor: A friendly skeleton that walks on its own or meshes with its master to boost strength and endurance.

properties.name: Personality
properties.description: Five settings.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Most models use omni-batteries. Ka-ghuli corp models also feed on organics.

properties.name: Walking
properties.description: Carries 2 sacks.

properties.name: Worn
properties.description: Increases strength and endurance to 5.

tasselledrhinestonejacket.name: Tasselled Rhinestone Jacket
tasselledrhinestonejacket.flavor: This jacket has it all, including bullet-proof and stab-proof linings to protect from over-zealous fans.

properties.name: Blatant
properties.description: [-] to stealth.

properties.name: Rhinestone memories
properties.description: Can store one spell or memory in the jacket’s glittering synthetic gems.

properties.name: Tassels
properties.description: Floopy strands confuse ghosts and vampires, imposing [-] to their tests against the wearer.

terminalproscription.name: Terminal Proscription
terminalproscription.flavor: A legal document, blessed by gods of city and government, exiles the target from the citizen brethren.

properties.name: Non-corpus
properties.description: Killing the target is treated as damage to the city's property, not murder.

properties.name: Exilio
properties.description: If the target immediately flees the city, they suffer minimum damage instead.

timeburst.name: Timeburst
timeburst.flavor: The soundless detonation floods an area with excess time. While a moment passes outside the event horizon, hours pass within.

properties.name: Nausea
properties.description: Creatures caught within the burst suffer a sense of being lost out of time ([-] to all tests). Breakfasts may be lost.

properties.name: No-entry
properties.description: Very hard test to enter the momentary sphere.

thedevourer.name: The Devourer
thedevourer.flavor: A voidworm extruded into the common dimensions and utilized as a ray cannon. Not a good charm to encounter.

properties.name: Prime devourer
properties.description: When the damage dealt is a prime number, the devourer swallows the target. The target reappears 3 zones away, 5 rounds later, marked with 7 polychrome weals, and carrying 11 void fox teeth (worth €1 each).

properties.name: Short-range
properties.description: [+] vs adjacent targets, [-] vs near targets. Cannot hit faraway targets.

properties.name: Two-handed
properties.description: It’s a big worm gun.

thirdeyegem.name: Third Eye Gem
thirdeyegem.flavor: A superior tiger’s eye gem with a trapped daemon’s eye.

properties.name: Implant
properties.description: Attaches to the body with ectoplasmic suckers. Spend 1 life to remove.

properties.name: Peripheral
properties.description: [+] vs surprises and flanking manoeuvres.

properties.name: Optic
properties.description: Provides slightly murky visual information.

properties.name: Wireless
properties.description: Effective to 30m.

thoughtsandteeth.name: Thoughts and Teeth
thoughtsandteeth.flavor: A bead necklace of ossified thoughts and monster teeth. It clatters and chatters and promises death and decay.

properties.name: Babbling
properties.description: The constant babble of the necklace grants [+] to tests against verbal magics and attacks, but [-] to concentration.

properties.name: Chatty ward
properties.description: +2 ka defence.

properties.name: The horror of teeth
properties.description: Targets reduced to 0 life fall into a stupor for 1 round and permanently lose 1 physical stat as a slight biting horror (L2) pulls itself out of their flesh. The horror does not follow commands.

tinfoilwardsuit.name: Tinfoil Wardsuit
tinfoilwardsuit.flavor: A rattling assembly of crumpled tinfoil, dials, and sensors. Scribbled upon it: 'They're listening!'

properties.name: Alert
properties.description: Emits a shrill alarm when hostile spiritual entities are near.

properties.name: Noisy
properties.description: [-] to tests of stealth.

properties.name: Silly
properties.description: [-] vs humiliating ba attacks.

properties.name: Specter deflector
properties.description: [+] vs the side effects of incoming ka attacks.

tinsectswarm.name: Tinsect Swarm
tinsectswarm.flavor: A swarm of tiny golems in a can. They have painful, acid stingers.

properties.name: Ammo
properties.description: The tinsects themselves. If all are used up, the swarm cannot replicate itself.

properties.name: Breeder
properties.description: Given a day, 1 life, and a supply of metal and organics, the tinsect swarm duplicates itself.

properties.name: Ranged
properties.description: Spring-loaded tinsects attack adjacent and nearby targets normally. [-] vs distant targets.

properties.name: Workers
properties.description: Using acid, tiny tools, and various weird light fields, the tinsects can expend themselves to chew through a lock, start a fire, saw through bars, or jump-start an engine. Other feats of microgolem engineering are also possible.

tophat.name: Top Hat
tophat.flavor: A cartoonishly classy hat still provides a sense of gravitas.

warhair.name: War Hair
warhair.flavor: The kind of hair a raider, marauder, barbarian, or rock star would wear.

properties.name: Armour of faith
properties.description: [-] to missile damage.

properties.name: Goes to eleven
properties.description: wearer gains [+] to one roll every time they roll 11.

towel,eternal.name: Towel, Eternal
towel,eternal.flavor: A magnificent towel embossed with the glyph-logo of a Long Long Ago magicorporation. Its fibres clean themselves, so the logo always looks as wonderful as when the towel was new.

properties.name: Courageous
properties.description: Worn properly around the head, the towel provides [+] against all scary things, but [-] to all tests requiring sight.

properties.name: Empathetic invisibility
properties.description: Hyperempathetic creatures cannot see the wearer while the towel is wrapped around their head.

properties.name: Soporific
properties.description: On hit: enemy becomes sleepy. They lose 1 action each round. A sleepy target that is hit falls asleep.

properties.name: Strange ammo
properties.description: Costs 1 Supply to refill tank after each combat.

transfergonne.name: Transfer Gonne
transfergonne.flavor: It takes a piece of the wielder and puts it into the target. Spiritually speaking.

properties.name: Ranged
properties.description: [-] vs far away targets.

properties.name: Transfer
properties.description: One of the wielder’s burdens now also afflicts the target.

truerubbergloves.name: True Rubber Gloves
truerubbergloves.flavor: Synthetic gloves that block electromagical fields. Useful for many kinds of wizard. Not very rugged, though.

properties.name: Hygienic
properties.description: [+] when handling poisons and diseases.

properties.name: Thermosensitive
properties.description: Loses a defence point when exposed to high temperatures.

trenchrifle.name: Trench Rifle
trenchrifle.flavor: Oiled wood and blue steel tipped with a bayonet that could have been mounted on a partisan.

properties.name: Ammunition
properties.description: Brass cartridges.

properties.name: Bayonet
properties.description: For close combat.

properties.name: Long-range
properties.description: Attacks nearby and far away targets without penalties.

twitchvipervenom.name: Twitchviper Venom
twitchvipervenom.flavor: Bright crimson fizzy juice in little perspex vials of the sort deposited by ampul wasps in the Conveyor Cloud Forests.

properties.name: Bright lights
properties.description: Target sees surprisingly well in the dark.

properties.name: Seizure
properties.description: Target loses 1 action, then suffers [-] to agility tests.

ultramechcodex.name: Ultramech Codex
ultramechcodex.flavor: A self-organizing logic log based on old-times proto-vome autonomous synthetic programming manuals. Still potent enough to scramble thought matrices.

properties.name: Command syntax
properties.description: For the rest of the round, target gains [+] to its tests if it follows wielder’s instructions, [-] if it does not.

properties.name: Vome-breaker
properties.description: Deals double damage to vomes.

undyingdream.name: Undying Dream
undyingdream.flavor: Once read in a tome of most profound learnings, the dream embeds within the innermost recesses of the soul’s desire, a wish to burst free of the bonds of mortality. With this longing comes an icy spirit grasp, a lance of pure mind, that chills the hearts of all who live and breathe.

properties.name: Collector
properties.description: Each time the wielder slays a different kind of creature (undead, golem, human, dragon, extra-dimension jelly angel, etc.) that they reduced to 0 life with this charm, they can extract a “piece of the puzzle”.

properties.name: Permanent
properties.description: Cannot be removed from wielder’s inventory.

properties.name: Piece of the puzzle
properties.description: Special spiritual item harvested by the dream. Each occupies an inventory slot and grants +1 to all defences.

properties.name: Seventh piece
properties.description: When the wielder gains a seventh piece of the puzzle, the undying dream immediately leaves them, and the wielder achieves abmortality. The wielder will never die of natural causes, but slow decay will steal their youth.

universalreset.name: Universal Reset
universalreset.flavor: In a middling area, everything resets to its moment of creation.

properties.name: Innocents
properties.description: The innocent are unchanged by the universal reset.

properties.name: Om
properties.description: All mistakes are null.

properties.name: What is creation
properties.description: Sentient creatures make a hard aura test. Success: they choose the moment in their lives when they became themselves. Fail: a random time that made them who they are.

upliftingorb.name: Uplifting Orb
upliftingorb.flavor: An ancient noösphere access orb rewired into a direct link projector. Its aural field-effect floods minds with an overwhelming array of information.

properties.name: Accidental uplift
properties.description: On a natural 12, the target permanently gains 1 thought. Most animals gain near-human intelligence. Only works once per individual.

properties.name: Digital immunity
properties.description: [-] damage to native noösphere users.

properties.name: Disorienting
properties.description: Target suffers [-] on its next test.

properties.name: Saphontic
properties.description: Only affects targets with minds.

properties.name: Wireless
properties.description: User can communicate remotely through the noösphere.

utilityaxe.name: Utility Axe
utilityaxe.flavor: A multitool axe in bright primary colours in the styles of the old Maintenance Warguilds.

properties.name: Tool
properties.description: Besides chopping, the utility axe has levering prongs and hammering surfaces. Additional folding tools in the handle.

uvlotion.name: UV Lotion
uvlotion.flavor: Traditional skin lotion milked from giant pharma-barnacles and bottled by a number of conglomerate clans. Protects skin from damaging UVG radiation.

properties.name: Anti-radiative
properties.description: [+] vs. radiant and radiation damage.

vampirerosé.name: Vampire Rosé
vampirerosé.flavor: Mirrored bottles heavy with the fermented juices of the bleeding grape cultivar of the Red Lands.

properties.name: Blood substitute
properties.description: Can be used for transfusions. Or a full night’s meal for a vampire.

properties.name: Type O-negative
properties.description: Universal donor. Almost.

properties.name: Visions
properties.description: Induces vegetable dreams of the grape vine.

vastlanderrobes.name: Vastlander Robes
vastlanderrobes.flavor: A set of robes in the relaxed styles of the vastlanders.

properties.name: Chitin weave
properties.description: All incoming ha damage is reduced [-].

properties.name: Cool
properties.description: [+] to tests against heat effects but imposes [-] to physical tests in cold environments.

vermin’sthrenody.name: Vermin’s Threnody
vermin’sthrenody.flavor: A small antipathic field sets up painful vibrations within creatures smaller than a thumb. Used to keep away bugs.

properties.name: Combustion
properties.description: Affected creatures may burst into flame. Fire hazard.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Crank-driven models required a servant.

vhessystem.name: VHES System
vhessystem.flavor: An amazing oldtech artifact that uses a series of projectors, hardlight holograms, and many-D sound modulators to turn a small area into a full-featured simulated environment—what some uncouth mages call an illusion.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Omnibatteries. 100%.

properties.name: Preset
properties.description: Comes with 5 basic environments: corporate meeting prison, LuxifabulousTM mall, tropical island, salubrious spa, and dragon-themed dungeon.

properties.name: Vidy-reader
properties.description: Can create illusory environments from most standard full-immersion vidys.

vibefuzz.name: Vibe Fuzz
vibefuzz.flavor: The tele-psychic aerogel is smeared on the transmitter’s scalp, face, and ears. Their next strongest emotion is then imprinted on a large area.

properties.name: Party drug
properties.description: Transmitters with particularly powerful, positive emotions are hired to maintain a zone of good vibrations at the finer Hedonicurean parties.

properties.name: Zone of empathy
properties.description: When a creature with a brain enters the affected area it makes a hard charisma test. If it fails, it is swamped by the dominant emotion. [+] and [-] to tests depending on whether the emotion helps or hinders.

vibroscalpel.name: Vibroscalpel
vibroscalpel.flavor: Contains settings for: surgery, melee combat, extra chunky, and fine puree.

properties.name: Deep cut
properties.description: Crit multiplier increased by 1.

properties.name: Medical
properties.description: [-] to damage vs allies.

properties.name: Sharp
properties.description: Crit range increased by 1.

vileofblood™ [sic].name: Vile of Blood™ [sic]
vileofblood™ [sic].flavor: An entropy-blocked vial of pure Original Vile blood with an automated injector. Looks like some kind of bracelet or watch. Best worn close to an artery.

properties.name: Relife
properties.description: If the wearer dies, the blood is instantly injected into their system, rebooting them to a semblance of abmortality— rejuvenating them by about a decade in the process. This destroys the vile of blood™.

properties.name: Tracker
properties.description: Tracks vital signs and location. Accessible via aether link or crystal ball (magic password: admin12345).

properties.name: Watch
properties.description: Current universal time.

voidwormtoothknife.name: Voidworm Tooth Knife
voidwormtoothknife.flavor: The flickering half-real tooth of a void worm—a terrifying paracreature that gnaws the unrealistic wormways between the worlds. The teeth wash up on the shores of the Voidly Seas, where the beachcombers of reality polish them into blades.

properties.name: Half-real
properties.description: Double damage to nightmares and delusions.

vomegore.name: Vome Gore
vomegore.flavor: A chunk of live violent-mechanism tissue, still crawling with corrupted machinery.

properties.name: Disturbing
properties.description: [+] to intimidate and frighten when displayed.

properties.name: Implanted
properties.description: Vome infection.

properties.name: Ingested
properties.description: Endurance test or vome infection.

properties.name: Vome infection
properties.description: Shivers and fevers for a few days: [-] to all tests. Then: endurance test or vome symbiote (burden). Natural 7: character gains free mutation or suitable trait.

properties.name: Worn
properties.description: [+] to pass for a vome.

properties.name: Vome symbiote
properties.description: Character gains a suitable trait or mutation, but permanently loses one stat point. Once per month, vome infection (see above) repeats.

voxdeii.name: Vox Deii
voxdeii.flavor: Special training and surgery grants the terrible voice, which turns bowels to water and brings fear to the hearts of mortals with intimations of eternal nihilation and the cosmic void.

properties.name: Permanent
properties.description: Cannot be removed from a character's inventory.

properties.name: Fearsome
properties.description: Target suffers [-] to morale, sanity, and fear tests for the rest of the round.

wasteconverter.name: Waste Converter
wasteconverter.flavor: A box of porcelain, coils, and strange conversion magics.

properties.name: Eat
properties.description: Ingests up to 7 human-sized creatures’ leavings per days.

properties.name: Emit
properties.description: Produces a warm omni-charge pearl after ingesting 7 leavings. Each pearl has 1 charge.

wizard’stail.name: Wizard’s Tail
wizard’stail.flavor: This chew root beloved of all scholics, sav e Puristas, is not nicknamed student’s sun for nothing.

properties.name: Brain fuel
properties.description: Boosts concentration. Grants [+] on cognitive tests or permits the user to focus on a spell as a free action.

properties.name: Wizard’s gaze
properties.description: Eyes change shape and colour. Grants low-light vision and reduces eye strain while reading by fritzing neoncharge. [-] to social tests with anyone who would disapprove of wizardry or drugs.

wizardlyquarterstaff.name: Wizardly Quarterstaff
wizardlyquarterstaff.flavor: A simple staff whose odd shadow seems to fight ghosts in a spirit realm illumined by strange suns.

properties.name: Defensive
properties.description: Grants 1 ha defence.

wormynodule.name: Wormy Nodule
wormynodule.flavor: A thin-skinned, humorously shaped, infested root vegetable.

properties.name: Ammo
properties.description: Sold in paper bags.

xenonoverdrive.name: Xenon Overdrive
xenonoverdrive.flavor: Added to fuel or food, it overclocks the target’s reality.

properties.name: Crash
properties.description: After the overdrive wears off, the user needs a day’s worth of food. Until they get it, they suffer [-] to social interactions.

properties.name: More more
properties.description: Once per round, the target can spend 1 life to get 1 more action.
